The Company S Skirted Chairs, Sofas And Leather Upholstery Achieve A Variety Of Classical, Traditional And Transitional Design Choices That Are Practically Unequalled IN The Furniture Industry. Each Piece Is Made With Contract Construction Standards To Withstand Heavy Commercial Use IN Fine Hotels, Country Clubs, Retirement Homes, Executive Offices And Embassies Throughout The World. The Strength Of The Southwood Line Is IN The Opportunity To Coordinate Compatible Styles IN Traditional, Exposed Wood Style Periods, With Fabric OR Leather, To Create A Signature Look. The Company S Southampton Division Specializes IN English Reproductions, Unique Traditional Styles And Hand Painted Pieces. Southwood Furniture Corporation Is Located IN Hickory, N.C.

label: southern-steel-co-llc
description: Southern Steel Has Long Been A Major Fabricator Of Structural Steel IN The Carolinas. An Affiliate Of Beta International, Southern Steel Maintains An Inventory Of Beams, Plates And Angles And Can Custom Fabricate Small Orders On Short Notice. Its Engineering Division Also Supports Contractors On Design/Build Projects By Providing Structural Engineering Services. Located IN Charlotte, N.C., On A 44-Acre Site, Southern Steel S 200,000-Square-Foot Production Facility Has Undergone Millions Of Dollars IN Improvements Since 1994, Including New Production Technology And Process Automation. The Facility Also Features An Angle/Beam Roll, A Plate Roll And A 33,000-Square-Foot Covered And Heated Painting Area.

label: southern-optical-co
description: Soutern Optical-Greensboro Offers A Variety Of Lens Services And Products. It Provides Products Under The Varilux, Ovation, Essilor Natural And Frameoptimization Brands. The Company Coordinates The Eloa Practicebuilder Program, Which Offers Rewards And Building Tools That Help IN Patient Vision Care. Soutern Optical-Greensboro Provides The Stimuleye Education Series That Offers Assistance IN Office Training And Techniques To Improve Profitability. It Also Offers Electronic Ordering, Remote Frame Tracing And Practice Builder Services. The Company Provides Demonstration Tools And Point-Of-Purchase Displays To Help Support A Range Of Coatings And Lens Materials. Soutern Optical-Greensboro Additionally Offers Sunwear Products With Transparent Mirror And Backside Coating.

label: southern-furniture-co-conover
description: Founded IN 1926, Southern Furniture Company Of Conover Is A Family-Owned Furniture Manufacturing Company. It Has A More Than 50,000-Square-Foot Facility And Over 300 Employees. The Company Provides Casual And Occasional Chairs And Sofas. Southern Furniture Company Of Conover Also Offers Leather And Traditional Settees. IN Addition, It Provides Transitional Furniture. The Company Offers Online Information On Care And Maintenance Of Products. It Has A Network Of Dealers Throughout The United States. Southern Furniture Company Of Conover Also Provides Handcrafted Furniture. It Stocks More Than 500 Designer Fabrics.

label: southern-film-extruders
description: Founded IN 1965, Southern Film Extruders Is One Of The Leading Producers Of Polyethylene Film For The Packaging Industry. The Company Provides A Broad Range Of Films For Various Packaging And Manufacturing Applications, Including Shrink Films, Release Sheets, Masking Films, Laminations And Skin Packaging. It Serves Various Industries, Such As Converter Film, Cosmetics, Frozen Foods, General Packaging, Poultry And Meat. Additionally, Southern Film Extruders Serves The Lamination, Lawn And Garden, Sleeve Film And Textile Industries. It Offers A Wide Range Of Films Using Low-Density, Linear Low-Density, Medium-Density, Metallocene Types And Various Blends Of These Resins. Southern Film Extruders Is Located IN High Point, N.C.

label: southern-fabricators-inc
description: Established IN 1968, Southern Fabricators Provides Start-To-Finish, Turn-Key Production Of Fabricated Parts. Its Customers Include A Diverse Range Of Industries And Applications That Include Automotive, Machine Tools And Power Distribution. Their Needs Include Both Small Parts And Large Assemblies; Prototypes And Long-Run Production. Southern Fabricators Maintains A 70,000 Square-Foot Plant Located IN Polkton, N.C.

label: southern-concrete-materials
description: Founded IN 1958, Southern Concrete Materials Is A Family-Owned And Operated Company That Supplies A Variety Of Ready-Mix Concrete And Precast Products. It Provides Junction Boxes, Septic Tanks, Well Pipes, Curb Bumpers, Water Troughs, Utility Vaults, Concrete Bags, Anchor Bolts, Sealers And Drainage Frames. The Company Is Also An Exclusive Dealer And Installer Of Redi-Rock Concrete Block And Wall Systems. Additionally, The Company Is An Official Dealer Of Kraft Tools. Southern Concrete Materials, With A Location IN Asheville, N.C., Operates More Than 30 Facilities IN Other Parts Of North Carolina. The Company Is Also Affiliated With The Carolinas Ready Mixed Concrete Association, The Georgia Concrete And Products Association, The National Ready Mixed Concrete Association And The Cabarrus Concrete Company.

label: southeastern-container-inc
description: Southeastern Container Is Bottle Manufacturer That Has More Than 20 Production Lines And Works Almost Exclusively With Coca-Cola. The Company Manufactures Plastic Bottles For Popular Beverages Such As Coca-Cola, Diet Coke, Sprite And Dasani. IN 2004, Southeastern Initiated An Automated Guided Vehicle Program That Effectively Replaced The Need For Forklifts. This Sort Of Innovation Is An Example Of How Southeastern Container Uses Technology To Increase Efficiency IN Its Plants. Southeastern Container Is One Of The Largest Blowmolders Of Plastic Bottles IN The United States. Southeastern Has Seven Plants That Supply Bottles To Coca-Cola Bottlers On The United States  East Coast. Most Of The Coca-Cola Products Bottled IN The Eastern United States Will Go Into A Bottle Produced By Southeastern Container. Production Lines Change Preform Size Frequently To Respond To Demands From The Other Southeastern Facilities. The Company Is Headquartered IN Enka, N.C.

label: southco-industries-inc
description: Southco Industries, Established IN 1952, Serves The Utility, Construction And Tree Care Industries By Offering Quality Products To Accommodate Its Customers With Special Needs Such As Hydraulic Winches, Prentice Log Loaders, National Cranes, Compressors, And A Number Of Omaha Standard Service And Line Bodies. The Company Is The Equipment Dealer For The Industries Top Manufacturers Specializing IN Truck Equipment. Southco Industries Is Among The World's Leading Manufacturers Of Forestry Truck Bodies. Southco Forestry Body Packages Have Been Designed To Accommodate The Needs Of Its Customers IN The Tree Care Industry. The Standard Features Include Galvannealed Material (Zinc Coated And Rust Resistant), Lexan Lens Lighting Packages (Fmuss 108 Specifications), Weatherproof Toolboxes And Chipper Air Exhaust Vents. Southco Industries Is Located IN Shelby, N.C.

label: southbend
description: Middleby Corporation Is A Global Leader IN The Food Service Equipment Industry. It Serves Customers IN The Cooking, Packaging And Food Processing Industries. The Company Develops, Manufacturers, Markets And Services A Range Of Equipment Used For Cooking And Food Preparation IN Commercial Restaurants, Institutional Kitchens And Food Processing Operations Throughout The World. It Operates Through Food Processing And Commercial Food Service Equipment And International Distribution Divisions. The Company's Equipment Brands Include Blodgett, Blodgett Combi, Blodgett Range, Bloomfield And Carter Hoffman. Middleby Corporation Also Provides Equipment Under Various Other Brands, Such As Ctx, Holman, Houno, Jade, Lang, Magikitch'n, Middleby Marshall, Nu-Vu, Pitco Frialator And Southbend. Middleby Corporation Maintains A Location IN Fuquay-Varina, N.C.

label: sonoco-products-co
description: Sonoco Products Company S Facility IN Mt. Olive, N.C., Is Among More Than 300 Sonoco Operations IN 35 Countries. Founded IN 1899 And Headquartered IN Hartsville, S.C., Sonoco Is A Global Manufacturer Of Industrial And Consumer Products And A Provider Of Packaging Services. Among Sonoco's Largest Products Are Engineered Carriers, Consisting Of Tubes And Cores. These Products Are Used For Winding And Transporting Such Items As Textiles, Paper, Film, Foil And Tape. The Company S Other Large Products Are Composite Cans. These Are Containers With Paperboard Bodies That Are Used A Variety Of Materials As Liners, Closures And Labels. IN Addition, Sonoco Makes Flexible Packaging, Corner Posts, Reels, Molded And Injection Molded Plastics, Folding Cartons And Coasters And Glass Covers.

label: sonoco-products-co
description: Sonoco, Formerly Known As Southern Novelty Company, Is A Global Provider Of A Variety Of Commercial And Consumer Product Packaging. Founded IN 1899, Sonoco Manufactures Uncoated And Recycled Paperboards, Plastic And Composite Tubes And Cores And A Wide Range Of Industrial Products, Including Paper Mill Packaging, High-Technology Plastic Products, Custom-Designed Protective Packaging For Appliances And Wires, And Composite And Metal Reels. Sonoco's Consumer Packaging Portfolio Includes Round And Shaped Rigid-Paper And Plastic Packaging, Printed Flexible Packaging, Metal And Plastic Ends And Closures, Brand Artwork Management, Packaging Supply Chain Management, Fulfillment And Design, And Manufacturing, Assembly And Distribution Of High-Impact Point-Of-Purchase Displays. Headquartered IN Hartsville, S.C., The Company Has More Than 17,000 Employees IN Over 35 Different Countries IN Cities Such As Fitchburg, N.C.

label: snyder-packing
description: Founded IN 1925, Snyder Packaging Is A Manufacturer Of A Variety Of Storage And Packaging Products. The Company Provides A Range Of Services, Such As Art Creation, Structural Design, Customized Fabrication, Imprinting, Embossing, Sheeting, Die Cutting, Foil Stamping, Gluing, Folding, Window Patching, Inventory Management, Shipping And Customer Support. Its Additional Services Include Printing, Finishing, Warehousing And Distribution. IN Addition To Services, It Manufactures Boxes, Containers, Inserts, Folding Cartons, Blister Cards And Paperboard Packaging Products. The Company Specializes IN Product Design, Custom Printing And Packaging Services. It Operates Through Sales Representatives And Suppliers. Snyder Packaging Is Headquartered IN Concord, N.C.

label: smurfit-stone-container-corp
description: Smurfit-Stone Container Corporation Is The World's Largest Paper Recycler, Annually Processing And Selling More Than 6.5 Million Tons. The Company Is One Of The Industry's Leading Integrated Manufacturers Of Paperboard And Paper-Based Packaging. Smurfit-Stone Is A Leading Producer Of Containerboard Including White Top Linerboard, Corrugated Containers, Multi-Walled And Specialty Bags And Clay-Coated Recycled Boxboard. IN Addition, Smurfit-Stone Container Corporation Is A Producer Of Solid Bleached Sulfate, Folding Cartons, Flexible Packaging, Labels And Point-Of-Purchase Displays. With Approximately 38,600 Employees Working At Nearly 260 Manufacturing Facilities, Smurfit-Stone Provides Paperboard And Packaging Products For Large And Small Businesses Throughout North America.

label: silver-line-plastics-corp
description: Silver-Line Plastics Corporation Was Founded IN 1962. Its First Home Was A Small Building Located Next To The Woodfin Grocery At The Intersection Of Riverside Drive And Elkwood Avenue IN The Mountains Of Asheville, N.C. The Company Was The First Pipe Manufacturer IN North America To Have A Fully-Computerized Blending Plant For Pvc Pipe. This Has Resulted IN An Improved Consistency Of Compound, Reduced Material Waste, Added Flexibility IN Production Output And An Overall Increase IN Productivity. Expanded Upon Eurpoean Technology To Create Coextruded Cellular Core Pipe As A Cost Effective Alternative To Solid Wall Pipe IN Non-Pressure Applications. Silver-Line Holds The U.S. Patent For The Extrusion Of Dual-Line Coex Cellular Core Products.

label: sierra-pine-a-ca-lp
description: Sierrapine S Motto Is  Whatever It Takes.  The Company Specialized IN Composite Panels And Is One Of North America S Largest Multi-Density Fiberboard, Particleboard And Moulding Producers. All Of Sierrapine S Particleboard, Mdf And Moulding Products Are Certified By Scs For Their Recycled OR Recovered Wood Fiber Content. The Company Is Also A Proud Recipient For The Last Two Years Of California S Waste Reduction Award, Which Is Presented By The California Integrated Waste Management Board. Founded IN 1992, Sierrapine Maintains Facilities IN Moncure, N.C.

label: siemens-energy-inc
description: Siemens Power Transmission Is A Subsidiary Of The Siemens Corporation. Established IN 1847, Siemens Corporation Is One Of The Largest Electronics And Engineering Companies IN The United States. The Company S Areas Of Operation Include Medical, Power, Automation And Control, Transportation, Information And Communications, Lighting, Building And Water Technologies And Home Appliances. It Offers A Variety Of Telecommunication Products, Including Analogue And Digital Telephones, Enterprise Solutions, Carrier Networks And Wireless Modules. The Company Also Develops Industry Facilities, Water And Wastewater Treatment Plants And Intelligent Traffic Systems And Provides Products And Services For Monitoring And Regulating Temperature, Fire Safety, Ventilation And Electricity. It Offers Equipment For Factory And Logistics Automation, Airport Logistics, Electronics Assembly And Materials Handling. Its Power Division Converts Energy Into Electricity And Supplies Equipment, Systems And Services. It Also Provides Financing And Real Estate Services, Including Equipment, Project And Export Financing, Investment Management And Insurance Services. Siemens Power Transmission Maintains A Location IN Wendell, N.C.

label: shuford-mills-llc
description: Since Its Founding IN 1880 By Abel A. Shuford And N.H. Gwyn On Gunpowder Creek Near Granite Falls, N.C., Shuford Mills Has Been A Premier Supplier Of Quality Yarns And Fabrics. The Company, One Of The Most Diversified Spinners IN The United States, Manufactures A Variety Of Quality Open-End And Ring-Spun Yarn Products Including Cotton, Polyester/Cotton Blends, 100 Percent Polyester And 100 Percent Acrylic. Products Range IN Size From Coarse To Fine Count As Well As Singles And Plied Yarn. With Five Plants, Shuford Mills' Manufacturing Base Is Comprised Of Three Open-End And One Ring-Spinning Sales Yarn Plant And One Weaving Facility. All Plants Are Located Within A Two-County Area Surrounding Its Corporate Headquarters IN Hickory, N.C. Shuford Mills Spun Yarns Can Be Found IN Upholstery Fabrics, Woven And Knit Apparel, Industrial Fabrics, Draperies, Carpets And Rugs, Trimming, Narrow Wovens And Industrial Sewing.

label: shuford-furniture
description: Century Furniture Industries Is A Furniture Manufacturer Offering Wood, Outdoor And Upholstery Collections Of Furniture. The Company Does Not Sell Directly To The Public; Only Through Its Authorized Dealers, Retailers And Designers Are Century S Products Available. Century Furniture S Products Are Available Throughout The United States. Collections Include Casa Collection, Coeur DE France, Kentshire, Savoy, Notting Hill And Richard Frinier. Century S Product Catalogs Are Sold Throughout The U.S. The Company Maintains Headquarters And A Manufacturing Facility IN Hickory, N.C. Century Furniture Industries Also Has Several Showrooms Throughout Hickory.

label: shamrock-corp
description: Paper Distributors Throughout The United States At The Annual Retail Packaging Manufacturer S Association Exhibit Named Shamrock Corporation The  Manufacturer Of The Year  IN 1993 And 1995. Founded IN 1956, Shamrock Is A Privately-Held Family Business Whose Primary Focus Is Rotogravure Printing And Converting Of Various Paper Products For Three Company Divisions. Shamrock's Three Divisions Consist Of Shamrock Gift Wrap & Accessories, Innisbrook Wraps And Shamrock Corporation Specialty Papers. The Company Recently Built A Printing, Converting And Shipping Facility. Shamrock Corporation Invests Heavily IN Computer Technology, Production Equipment And Personnel To Maintain Its Standing IN The Gift Wrap, Giblet Wrap And Fund-Raising Markets.

label: sgl-carbon-llc
description: Sgl Group Is One Of Leading Manufacturers Of Carbon-Based Products Worldwide. It Offers Carbon And Graphite Products, As Well As Carbon Fibers And Composites. The Company Serves The Steel, Aluminum, Automotive, Chemical And Glass Industries. It Operates More Than38 Production Sites IN Europe, North America And Asia. The Company S Product List Includes Graphite And Carbon Electrodes, Cathodes And Furnace Linings And Brake Discs. Sgl Group Manufactures Insulation Materials, Textile Products, Pumps, Safety Disks And Rocket Motor Nozzles For The Semiconductor, Battery, Wind Energy, Environmental Protection, Aerospace And Defense Industries. It Offers Its Products Under The Diabon, Flurosic And Sicabon Brands.

label: selee-corp
description: Selee Corporation Is A 200-Employee Technical Ceramics Company Specializing IN The Design And Manufacturing Of Porous Technical Ceramics And Metals For A Wide Range Of Demanding Industrial Applications. While Selee's Principal Business Is Ceramic Foam Filters, Numerous Other Porous And Fully Dense Ceramic Products Are Part Of The Company S Product Portfolio As Well. Selee's 170,000-Square-Foot Facility Is Located IN The Blue Ridge Mountains Of Western North Carolina. The Quality And Environmental Management Systems Of Selee Corporation Are Certified To The Iso 9001:2000 And Iso 14001-1996 Standards As Well As Numerous Customer Certifications Including Ford Q-1 And Howmet Certified Supplier.

label: scurry-construction-inc
description: Scurry Construction Is A Grading And Utility Contractor That Specializes IN Providing Turn-Key Site Work Packages. Established IN 1995, The Company Employs A Staff Of More Than 100 Employees. It Stocks Heavy Equipment By Various Manufacturers, Including Caterpillar, Dynapac, John Deere And Volvo. The Company Maintains A Fleet Of More Than 55 Dump And Service Trucks And Transport Vehicles. Scurry Construction Maintains A Utility Division That Offers Installation Services For Water And Sewer Lines And Storm Drainage. The Company Also Provides On-Site Repair Services And Is Licensed To Operate IN North Carolina And South Carolina. It Is A Member Of The Better Business Bureau And The Home Builders Association Of Charlotte. Scurry Construction Is Located IN Cornelius, N.C.

label: schult-homes
description: Schult Homes Has Been One Of The Most Respected Names IN Manufactured Housing Since 1934. Since Its Founding, The Company Has Remained At The Forefront Of Innovations From The First Steel Frames And Forced-Air Heating IN 1940s To The Maintenance-Free Features And Energy-Saving Measures Of Today. Schult S Focus Is On Tastefully Designed, Family-Oriented Homes That Feature Such Amenities As Walk-IN Closets, Efficient Kitchens, Luxury Baths And Functional Living Areas. Schult Homes Are Sold By Manufactured Home Retailers Throughout The United States. Schult Is A Division Of Clayton Homes, Which Won The Manufactured Housing Institute S Manufacturer Of The Year Every Year From 2000 To 2005. Schult Homes Has Seven Regional Offices, Including One IN Richfield, N.C.

label: schneider-mills-inc
description: Founded IN 1916 By Samuel Schneider, Schneider Mills Is A Privately Held Company That Is A Manufacturer Of Woven And Textile Fabrics For Industrial Applications. It Features A Variety Of Woven Fabrics, Including Plain, Basket, Twill, Satin, Rip Stop And Double Face Satin Weaves. The Company S Products Are Used IN Aerospace Components, Apparel, Athletic Uniforms, Backpacks, Banners And Flags, Computer And Sports Bags, Filtration Fabrics, Industrial Uniforms And Fabrics, Luggage, Military Applications, Personal Floatation Devices, Police Jackets, Tents And Sleeping Bags. Schneider Mills Features A Range Of Equipment, Including Warpers, Slashers And Winders. The Company Additionally Features An Online Request Form.

label: sarstedt-group
description: The Sarstedt Group Develops, Manufactures And Sells Equipment And Consumables IN The Field Of Medicine And Research. Since Its Establishment IN 1961, The Company Has Grown To The Point That It Employs A Workforce Of Nearly 2,500. The Sarstedt Group Markets And Sells Its Products Throughout The World Exclusively Via Its Own Marketing Organizations And Its Own Field Service. Its Product Line Includes Consumables And Analytical Equipment For Medical Diagnostics And Consumables For Use IN Medical Patient Care. The Company S Product Line Also Includes Laboratory Aids And Laboratory Equipment For Industrial And Research Laboratories And Also For Environmental Analytical Work. Headquartered IN Newton, N.C., The Sarstedt Group Is A Privately Owned Company.

label: sapona-manufacturing-co-inc
description: Sapona Manufacturing Company Is A Private Textile Company. It Processes Mid-To-Fine Denier Synthetic Yarn, Including Textured Nylon And Covered Spandex. The Company S Process Options Include Stretch OR Set False Twist Texturing, Packaging, Dye Tube Winding, Cone Winding, Assembly Winding, Air Covering, Ring Twisting And Two For One Twisting. Various Options Of Yarn Type, Ply, Twist, Air Entanglement, Finish And Dye Are Also Available. Additionally, Sapona S Quality System Conforms To The Requirements Of Iso 9002:1994. Founded IN 1916, Sapona Manufacturing Company Maintains Headquarters IN Franklinville, N.C.

label: santa-fe-natural-tobacco-co
description: Santa Fe Natural Tobacco Company, Founded IN 1982, Manufactures A Range Of Cigarettes And Other Tobacco Products From Certified Organic Tobacco. The Company Contracts With Independent Farmers To Grow Tobacco According To Various Standards Of The United States Department Of Agriculture. The Company S Environmental Tobacco Growing Programs Promote Earth-Friendly Land Stewardship Practices. Santa Fe Natural Tobacco Company, With A Location IN Santa Fe, N.M., Operates Various Manufacturing Facilities And Distribution Centers IN North Carolina And Nevada. Additionally, The Company Supports Several Community Projects And Operates A Nonprofit Organization That Provides Grants To Preserve And Promote American Indian Language And Culture.

label: sans-technical-fibres-llc
description: Unifi, Headquartered IN Greensboro, N.C., Supplies High-Quality Polyester And Nylon Textured Yarns And Related Raw Materials Worldwide. It Offers Solution-Dyed Textured Yarns, Package-Dyed Textured And Spun Yarns, Covering Of Elastomeric And Other Yarns, Conventional Warp-Draw Beaming, And Yarn Twisting. The Company S Yarns Are Used IN Home Furnishings, Apparel, Sewing, And Industrial, Automotive, Military, And Medical Applications. Unifi Manufactures Products By Adding Permanent Performance Characteristics, Such As Moisture Management, Ultraviolet Protection, And Antimicrobial And Odor Control Properties. The Company Has Also Introduced New Technologies That Allow It To Combine Multiple Performance Properties IN A Single Yarn. Unifi Has More Than 20 Value-Added Products IN Its Portfolio.

label: sanford-public-works-dept
description: The Public Works Department At The City Of Sanford, N.C., Consists Of Twelve Divisions And More Than 130 Employees. These Divisions Include Engineering, Sewer Utilities, Water Utilities, Fleet Maintenance, Beautification, Building And Grounds, Solid Waste, Street Maintenance, Wastewater Plant And Water Plant. The Department S Water Treatment Plant Has The Capacity To Treat 12 Million Gallons Of Water Per Day. The Wastewater Treatment Plant Has A Permitted Capacity Of 6.8 Million Gallons Per Day. The Public Works Department's Purpose Is To Provide Essential And Quality-Of-Life Services To The Citizens Of Sanford, N.C.

label: sanford-public-works
description: The Public Works Department, Administered By The City Of Sanford, Consists Of More Than 10 Divisions And Over 130 Employees. The Department Operates A Water Treatment Plant That Serves Daily Water Supply To The Residents Of The City. Its Engineering Division Supervises Engineering Design And Plan Review Of Extensions Of Water, Sewer And Street Systems. The Public Works Department Also Operates A Wastewater Construction And Maintenance Division That Offers Cleaning Services Of Sewer Mains, As Well As Mowing And Maintaining Of Rights-Of-Way. Its Fleet Maintenance Division Manages Nearly 250 Vehicles And Motorized Equipment. The Department Additionally Operates Wastewater Treatment Plant. The Public Works Department Is Located IN Sanford, N.C.

label: salem-one
description: Established IN 1987, Salem Printing Provides Commercial Printing And Packaging Solutions For Financial Institutions, Advertising Agencies, And Food, Textile, Tobacco And Pharmaceutical Companies. It Manufactures Tags, Labels, Inserts, Cards, Folding Cartons And Several Additional Packaging Components. The Company S IN-House Prepress Department Specializes IN Digital Proofing And Processing. It Also Specializes IN Providing Scoring, Cutting, Folding, Gluing, Perforating, Collating, Laminating And Saddle Stitching, As Well As Distribution And Mailing Services. IN Addition, The Company Provides Variable Data Printing Solutions With The Use Of Biz-Hub Printers. Salem Printing Is Located IN Winston-Salem, N.C.

label: salem-one
description: Advanced Mailing, Founded IN 1989, Is A Provider Of Mailing And Data Management Services. The Company Provides Data Entry Solutions To Include Additions, Changes And Deletions IN Mailing Lists And Postal Presorting. Its Mailing Services Include Addressing, Tabbing, Labeling, Inserting And Folding. It Offers Complete Pickup And Delivery Services And Also Provides Response Analysis Of Direct Marketing Campaigns, Statistical Reporting And Mailing List Rentals. Its Additional Services Include Printing, Imaging, Lettershop And Fulfillment Services. Advanced Mailing Offers U.S. Postal Service Tracking And Design And Copywriting For Direct Mail Campaigns. Its Clients Include The Sas Institute, United Healthcare, Moses Cone Health System, Market America And Bouvier Kelly. Advanced Mailing Is Based IN Greensboro, N.C.

label: safelite-auto-glass
description: Founded IN 1947, Safelite Autoglass Is One Of The Leading Providers Of Vehicle Glass Repair And Replacement Services IN The United States. It Serves More Than 3.7 Million Customers Annually. The Company Offers Repair Solutions For Models From Various Makes, Such As Acura, Bmw, Buick, Cadillac, Gmc, Honda, Hyundai And Kia. Safelite Autoglass Operates A Retail Vehicle Glass Division. It Maintains A Staff Of Over 3,100 Employees. The Company Operates A Network Of Nearly 80 Warehouses Throughout The U.S. Safelite Autoglass Maintains Safelite Glass Corporation, Which Has A Manufacturing And Distribution Facility IN Enfield IN North Carolina. The Company Is A Subsidiary Of Belron Us.

label: safe-fleet-bus-&-rail
description: IN Business Since The Mid 1970s, Specialty Manufacturing Inc. Provides Safety And Interior Solutions To The Transportation Industry. Based IN Pineville, N.C., It Is Involved IN The Design And Manufacture Of Safety Equipment. The Company Offers A Range Of Products, Including Stop Arms, Crossing Arms, Roof/Escape Hatches, Warning Lights, Interior Paneling, Interior Lighting, Interior Luggage Racks, Floor Coverings And More. An Iso 9001:2008 Registered Company, Specialty Manufacturing Inc. Has A Network Of Distributors Within The United States And Europe.

label: s-&-w-ready-mix-concrete-co
company: S & W Ready Mix Concrete Co

label: rutland-plastic-technologies
description: Founded IN 1962, Rutland Plastic Technologies Is One Of The Leading Manufactures Of Plastisol Compounds And Polyurethanes For Commercial Applications. The Company Offers A Range Of Products For Automotive And Non-Automotive Filtration Compounds And Fabric And Scrim Coatings. It Also Provides Plastisols For Dip Coatings And Moldings. The Company Has Expertise IN The Area Of Manufacturing Plastisol Screen Printing Inks. The Company Specializes IN Making White Inks And Bases. It Offers A Variety Of Color Booster Mixing Systems, Such As White Color Boosters And Permanent Red Color Boosters. Additionally, The Company Sells Specialty Powders And Flakes. It Manufactures Reducers, Tickeners And Modifiers. The Company Is Located IN Pineville N.C.

label: ruston-paving-co-inc
description: Established IN 1943, Ruston Paving Company Provides Commercial And Industrial Paving And Site Development Services. The Company Maintains Office Locations IN New York, Virginia And North Carolina. It Handles A Variety Of Asphalt Paving Projects, Including New Construction, Repair And Rehabilitation. Ruston Paving Company Provides Resurfacing, Grading, Excavating, Soil Stabilization And Pavement Reclamation Services. The Company Undertakes Projects IN Office Buildings, Manufacturing Facilities, Schools, Parks, Churches, Warehouses, And Shopping And Retail Centers. Additionally, It Specializes IN Paving Running Tracks, Play Areas, And Tennis And Basketball Courts. Ruston Paving Company Has Capabilities For Undertaking Site Surveys And Professional Site Design Works.

label: robert-bosch-tool-corp
description: Operational Since 18865, Robert Bosch Tool Corporation Designs, Manufactures And Sells Power And Rotary Tools And Lawn And Garden Equipment. It Serves Various Industrial Supply Houses, Rental Firms, Retail Hardware Stores And Home Improvement Centers. The Company Offers Products Under The Bosch, Skil, Dremel, Rotozip, Vermont American And Gilmour Brands. It Is Managed By Bosch Group, Which Is One Of The Leading Global Suppliers Of Technology Services. Bosch Group Manages The Bosch Research And Technology Center, Which Provides Wireless Technologies For Automotive, Building Technology, Consumer Goods And Industrial Applications. It Develops, Manufactures And Supplies Precision Components And Power Train Products For Vehicle Manufacturers. The Organization Employs A Work Force Of More Than 250,000 People.

label: robert-bosch-tool-corp
description: Operational For More Than 60 Years, Vermont American Is One Of The World S Largest Manufacturers Of Power Tool Accessories. It Is A Part Of Robert Bosch Tool Corporation, Which Is The North American Branch Of Robert Bosch. Vermont American Specializes IN The Manufacture Of Bits And Blades That Are Designed To Meet Rugged Jobsite Requirements. The Company Manufactures And Supplies Circular Saw Blades, Twist Drill And Screwdriver Bits, And Router Tables And Accessories. It Also Provides Masonry, Specialty Drill And Wood Drilling Bits, As Well As Drill Bit Extensions And Drilling Accessories. Vermont American Additionally Offers A Line Of Abrasive Products, Including Diamond Blades, Files, Rasps And Grinding Points.

label: robert-abbey-inc
description: Robert Abbey Is A Privately Owned Company That Manufactures A Variety Of Lighting Products And Fixtures. The Company Serves The Home Furnishings And Hospitality Industries, Hotels, Restaurants, Offices, Commercial Buildings And Private Facilities. The Products Offered By The Company Include Chandeliers, Floor Lamps, Sconces And Table Lamps. It Operates Showrooms IN Various Locations Throughout The United States, Including Texas, Georgia, Nevada And North Carolina. Robert Abbey Has A Customer Service Department That Provides Sales Support Services To Its Clients. The Company S Web Site Offers Online Product Catalogs And Information About New Products. It Also Offers Online Product Booking Options. Robert Abbey Is Located IN Hickory, N.C.

label: rexam-inc
description: Founded IN 1903, Owens-Illinois Inc. Is One Of The Leading Glass Container Manufacturers IN The World. The Firm Manufactures Containers For The Food And Beverage Industries, Including Beer, Wine, Spirits And Non-Alcoholic Drinks. It Is A Preferred Partner For Various World Leading Food And Beverage Brands. The Company Serves Many Brands, Including Budweiser, Carlsberg, Coors, Fetzer, Foster's, Heinz, Nestle, Jack Daniel's, Miller, Heineken And Pepsi. Owens-Illinois Inc. Also Offers Glass Packaging Solutions To Global Marketplace And Operates Across Four Regions Of Asia Pacific, Europe, Latin America And North America, Spanning 21 Countries.

label: resers-foods
description: Reser S Fine Foods Is A Family-Owned Company That Provides A Variety Of Meat Snacks, Salads, Side Dishes And Dips. It Maintains Kitchen Facilities Throughout The United States. The Company Offers Mexican-Style Food Items Under The Baja Caf  Brand. Reser S Fine Foods Provides Tortillas, Enchiladas, Burritos And Salsa Dishes. Its Other Brands Include The Stonemill Kitchens, Mrs. Kinser S And Don Pancho. description: Parkdale Mills Is One Of The World S Largest Independent Producers Of Cotton And Cotton-Blend Yarns. Since 1916, The Company Has Used A Consistent Focus On The Latest Technologies And How These Technologies Can Improve The Company S Product, Which Have Made It A Leader IN The Industry. Parkdale Mills Has A Plant IN Hillsville, Va., And It Manufactures Ring-Spun Yarn, Cotton, Cotton/Polyester-Blend Yarns And 100-Percent Polyester Yarns. Parkdale Mills Is The Only Company To Use Open-End, Ring-Spun, Air Jet And Vortex Spinning Systems IN The Production Environment. Parkdale Mills Is Headquartered IN Gastonia, N.C., And Maintains More Than 25 Plants Throughout North Carolina.

label: pallet-express-inc
description: Pallet Express Offers A Full Line Of Pallets And Pallet Related Services. The Company S Products And Services Include Standard Sized Pallets, Custom Built Pallets, Pallet Disposal And Pallet Management And Repair. It Owns And Operates A Fleet Of Nine Tractors, Three Straight Trucks And A Pool Of 100 Trailers. The Company Services All Industries And Any Size Company Backed By Industry Leading Service. Pallet Express Is Located IN Greensboro, N.C.

label: pactiv
description: With Annual Sales Revenue Of More Than $3 Billion, Pactiv Corporation Is One Of The Leading Providers Of Packaging Solutions To The Consumer And Food Service Industries IN The United States. The Company Offers Disposable Cookware And Tableware And Waste And Slider Storage Bags Under The Hefty Brand Name. Pactiv Corporation Also Provides Building Wraps, Drainage Mats, And Insulation And Waterproofing Protection Boards. IN Addition, It Offers Packaging Solutions For Fresh Produce, Meat, Fish, And Bakery And Egg Products. The Company S Products Are Sold To Supermarkets, Distributors, Restaurants, Schools, And Food Packers And Processors. Pactiv Corporation Markets Its Products Through Mass Merchandisers, Warehouse Clubs And Grocery Stores.

label: pace-communications
description: Pace Communications Is One Of The World S Leading Independent Custom Publishers. The Company Produces More Than 35 Million Magazine Copies Annually Over A Platform Of 20 Publications Reaching 11 Million Readers Per Month. Pace S Video And Audio Services Department Handles The Acquisition, Scheduling, Post-Production And Distribution Of Hundreds Of Hours Of Feature Film, Television And Audio Programming For Its Clients Each Month. Its Clients Come From A Wide Range Of Avenues IN The Business World. This Includes Leading Consumer, Business-To-Business, Nonprofit And Web-Driven Enterprises. Pace Communications Is Located IN Greensboro, N.C.

label: oxford-university-press
description: Oxford University Press Is One Of The Leading Publishers Of Schoolbooks, College Textbooks And Reference Books IN The World. Located IN Cary, N.C., The Press Publishes A Range Of Books, Journals And Electronic Products IN Many Subjects And For Many Markets. It Prints IN Many Countries IN A Variety Of Different Languages, For All Levels And Across The Entire Range Of Academic Disciplines. Oxford University Press Specializes IN The Publication Its Dictionaries And Reference Works.

label: otto-environmental-systems
description: There Are More Than 66 Million Otto Environmental Systems Carts IN Use Worldwide. Otto Environmental Systems Is A Proven Leader IN The Solid Waste Industry With More Than 70 Years Of Solid Waste Collection Component Development And Production Experience. Otto Environmental Systems Is A Member Of The Worldwide Otto Group. The Otto Group Of Companies Is The Largest Manufacturer Of Plastic Waste Containers IN The World. The Company S Products Include Residential Carts, Commercial Containers, Lifters, Recycle Bins And Automated Litter Receptacles. Otto Environmental Systems Is Headquartered IN Charlotte, N.C.

label: orange-water-&-sewer-authority
description: Operational Since 1977, Orange Water And Sewer Authority Is The Public, Nonprofit Water And Sewer Agency That Serves The Carrboro-Chapel Hill Community IN North Carolina. It Provides Quality Drinking Water For The Customers Through The Operations And Maintenance Of The Water Supply, Treatment And Distribution System. Additionally, The Authority Is Responsible For Protecting The Environment Through The Operation And Maintenance Of The Wastewater Collection, Treatment And Recycling Systems. Its Web Site Provides Billing And Meter Information To Its Customers. IN Addition, It Supports Farmers To Make Improvements To Protect The Land And Water Quality. Orange Water And Sewer Authority Is Located IN Carrboro, N.C.

label: omtron-usa-llc
description: Townsends Processing Plant Is Part Of A Vertically Integrated Poultry Production Company That Makes A Variety Of Chicken Products For Wholesale And Retail Distribution. The Company Was Established IN 1937. Townsends Is One Of The Largest Chicken Processors IN The United States. It Produces More Than 12 Million Pounds Of Chicken A Week, Nearly 625 Million Pounds Per Year. It Is One Of The Top Three Producers Of Quality Boneless Breast Meat IN The Nation, With An Annual Production Level Of More Than 125 Million Pounds. Its Plants Produce Whole Birds, Chicken Parts, Boneless Breasts, Boneless Leg Meat, Portion Control Breasts, Retail Products And Custom Products. Approximately 80 Percent Of This Output Is Sold To Poultry Distributors, Retail Chains And Food Service Institutions Across The Country. The Remainder Is Exported To Countries Such As Japan, Hong Kong And Singapore. The Company S Corporate Headquarters Is IN Wilmington, Del. It Has Operations IN Arkansas And A Processing Plant IN Siler City, N.C.

label: olympic-products
description: Vitafoam, Located IN Greensboro, N.C., Is A Specialized Manufacturing Facility, Owned And Operated By Its Parent Company, Vitafoam Incorporated, Which Maintains Headquarters IN High Point, N.C. Vitafoam Incorporated Manufactures Custom Foam Products For The Home And Commercial Health Care Industries. The Greensboro Facility Manufactures Bedding, Foam Blocks And Rolls, Automotive Foam Products And Foam Products Used IN Technical Applications. Its Capabilities Include Foam Conversion, Profile Cutting, Loop Slitting And Round Block Peeling.

label: oliver-rubber-co
description: Oliver Rubber Company, Founded IN 1912, Is A Manufacturer Of Rubber Products. It Offers A Wide Variety Of Pre-Cure And Mold-Cure Tread Rubber For Retreaders And Commercial Users. The Company S Fleet Services Focus On The Network Of Independent Licensed Retreading Dealers Throughout North America And Include Roadside Emergency Dispatch, Customized Corporate Billing And Tire Performance Consulting Services. It Has A Tire Analysis Program That Includes Scrap Tire Analysis And Fleet Surveys That Provide Recommendations For Improved Tire Management And Maintenance. It Also Provides IN-Field Comparative Testing Services. IN Addition, The Company Has An Online Store For Its Clients. Oliver Rubber Company Is Headquartered IN Findlay, Ohio.

label: oldcastle-adams
description: Adams Products Company Is One Of The Leaders IN Concrete Masonry Technology And Design. For More Than 50 Years, The Company Has Maintained An Inventory Of Concrete Products IN A Variety Of Colors, Shapes And Sizes. Products Include Decorative, Fireproof And Oversized Brick From Manufacturers And Brands Such As Quik Brick, Palmetto Brick, Pine Hall Brick And Triangle Brick. The Company Also Has A Team Of Consultants That Design Projects For Individual Customers. Adams Products Company Is A Division Of Crh, A Leading International Building Materials Group With Headquarters At Belgard Castle IN Dublin, Ireland. Crh America Has Domestic Headquarters IN Atlanta.

label: oiles-america-corp
description: Oiles America Corporation Is The North American Subsidiary Of Oiles Corporation Of Japan, One Of The Internationally Recognized Leaders IN Maintenance-Free Bearing Products. The Company Is One Of The Major Suppliers Of Bearing Products To The Auto Industry, Both As A First Tier Supplier And IN Support Of Other First Tier Manufacturers. IN The Industrial Equipment Market, Oiles America Corporation S Maintenance-Free Bearing Products Provide Effective Alternatives To Automatic Lubrication Systems, While Freeing Machine Operators From Day-To-Day Lubrication Requirements. The Main Objectives Of Oiles America Include Production And Sales Of Oilless Bearings; Production And Sales Of Precision Machinery, Machine Tools, Carrier Equipment, Office Equipment And Their Components; Production And Sales Of Construction And Civil Engineering Equipment; Production And Sales Of Telecommunications Equipment, Electrical Machinery, Instruments And Their Components; And Research And Development. Headquartered IN Plymouth, Mich., Oiles America Corporation Employs Nearly 75 People.

label: nypro-carolina
description: Nypro Carolina Provides Injection Molded Products And Services, IN Partnership With Customers IN The Consumer, Industrial, Electronics, Telecommunications, Health Care, Automotive And Contract Manufacturing Industries. Nypro Carolina Is A Division Of Nypro. Nypro Operates More Than 60 Separate Businesses IN 18 Countries That Design Plastics Products, Build Molds Used To Mold Plastics, Perform Plastics Injection Molding, Supply Other Parts Needed To Be Assembled With Plastics Parts And Assemble The Parts And Prepare Them For Delivery To Customers. IN Addition, The Company Is An Fda Registered Device Manufacturer. Additionally, Its Consumer Division Manufactures A Variety Of End-User Products With A Focus On Rigid Packaging.

label: nypro-carolina
description: Nypro Carolina Is A Device Manufacturer That Offers A Range Of Plastic-Molded Products. It Serves Clients IN The Industrial, Electronics, Telecommunications, Packaging And Health Care Industries. The Company Provides Precision Injection Molding, Segregated Material Handling, Pad Printing And Ultrasonic Welding Services. It Also Offers Cell Manufacturing, IN-Mold Labeling, Robotic Parts Handling And Conveyor Indexing Services. Nypro Carolina Additionally Provides Automatic Assembling, Machining, Grinding And Programmed Tool Maintenance Services. The Company S Packaging Division Offers A Variety Of Filling And Pack-Out Services. It Is A Part Of Nypro, A Plastics Company That Operates More Than 50 Businesses IN Over 15 Countries Throughout The World. Nypro Carolina Maintains A Location IN Burlington, N.C.

label: null-furniture-inc
description: Null Furniture Is An Import Furniture Distributor Located IN The Heart Of The Furniture Area Of Piedmont, N.C. The Null Furniture Product Assortment Consists Of Small Stand Alone Accent Pieces Offered IN A Variety Of Finishes, As Well As Table Groupings To Provide Complete Occasional Table Furnishings For The Home. Its Products Are Distributed Through Hundreds Of Independently Owned Retailers Throughout The United States. One Of Its Main Goals Is To Maintain Stock On Most Items IN Order To Provide Quick And Complete Shipping Of Orders. Experience IN Manufacturing And Product Design Helps To Enable Null Furniture To Provide A Structurally Sound And Trendy Line Of Furniture. Null Furniture Is Located IN Maiden, N.C., And Employs Approximately 100 People.

label: nsi-tork-inc
description: Tork Offers A Range Of Lighting And Electrical Products. It Provides A Variety Of Electromechanical And Digital Time Switches. The Company Offers Photoelectric Controls And Occupancy Sensors. Tork Provides Air Conditioning Disconnects And Pool And Spa Controllers. It Offers A Range Of Weatherproof Covers And Residential Timers. The Company Provides Audio And Visual Signaling Devices Under The Brand Torkalert. Tork Offers A Variety Of Engineering And Project Management Services. It Is A Division Of Nsi Industries, Which Also Provides Various Lighting Products. The Parent Company Operates The Hvac/R Division, Which Offers Wire Connectors, Switches, Terminals, Tools, Benders, Testers And Taps.

label: nsi-industries-llc
description: Nsi Industries Manufactures And Supplies A Variety Of Electrical Products. It Offers Insulated Splices Under The Polaris Brand. The Company Also Provides Products Under The Easy-Splice, Easy Wrap, Easy-Tap And Easy-Twist Brands. Nsi Industries Offers Electromechanical Time Switches For The Automatic Control Of Lighting And Electrical Equipment. Its Division, Tork, Offers Occupancy Sensors And Audio And Visual Signaling Devices Under The Torkalert Brand. The Company S Hvac/R Division Offers Connectors, Grounding And Lighting Products. Nsi Industries Additionally Provides Air Conditioning Disconnect Switches And Weatherproof Covers.

label: novo-nordisk-pharmaceutical
description: Novo Nordisk Pharmaceutical Industries Is A Part Of Of Denmark-Based Novo Nordisk. The Company Specializes IN The Production Of Human Insulin Crystals And Chemical Stabilizers. It Also Offers Ultrapure Water And Aseptic Filling For Glass Vials. The Company Also Offers Haemostasis Management And Provides Growth Disorders Solutions. Novo Nordisk Also Has Expertise IN The Area Of Hormone Replacement Therapy. The Company S Production Is Based On Biotechnology And Uses Genetically Modified Microorganisms. It Also Provides Strategic And Tactical Solutions And Has A Center For Compliance For Quality Assurance. The Company Participates IN Various Sustainable Development Projects. Novo Nordisk Pharmaceutical Industries Is Located IN Clayton, N.C.

label: novipax
description: As A Leading Global Manufacturer Of Materials And Systems For Protective, Presentation And Fresh Food Packaging, Sealed Air Corporation Provides Its Services For The Industrial, Food And Consumer Industries. Under Its Cryovac Brand, The Company Provides The Safe And Efficient Distribution Of Perishable Food Products. Manufactured Materials Include Shrink Film And Bag Products, Non-Shrink Laminate Products And Packaging Equipment Systems. Sealed Air Revolutionized Protective Packaging With The Invention Of Bubble Wrap Cushioning IN 1960. The Company S Bubble Wrap Product Line Is So Widely Recognized That The Last Monday Of January Every Year Has Been Declared National Bubble Wrap Appreciation Day. Sealed Air S Instapak Foam-IN-Place Cushioning Reduces Packaging Material Requirements And Minimize Damage During Shipping And Storage. Its Fill-Air Inflatable Cushioning Protects Goods IN Shipping. The Company Maintains A Worldwide Network Of More Than 35 Packaging Design And Food Science Laboratories. Sealed Air S International Headquarters Are Located IN Saddle Brook, N.J., With A Facility Maintained IN Rockingham, N.C.

label: north-state-flexibles-llc
description: North State Flexibles Provides Flexible Packaging For Maximum Point-Of-Purchase Impact. The Company Specializes IN High-Impact Flexographic Printing, Laminating And Custom Converting Of Various Film Materials Into An Array Of Flexible Packaging Products For Consumer And Industrial Goods. The Company Is Iso-9001 Certified And Offers Design Services, Technical Support And State-Of-The-Art Pre Press Capabilities. Services Offered By The Company Include Pre Press, Printing And Laminating, Technical And Product Support And Converting. North State Flexibles  Product Line-Up Is Comprised Of Reclosable Zipper Bags, Reinforced Film Header Bags, Paperboard Reinforced Header Bags, Flat And Bottom-Gusseted Bags, Handle Bags, Polyethylene Stretch Sleeves, Heat Shrinkable Sleeves, Traditional Doyen-Style Stand-Up Pouches, Round-Bottom Stand-Up Pouches, Wicketed Stand-Up Pouches And Three-Side Seal And Round-Bottom Flat Pouches. Industries Served By North State Include Amimal Care, Agricultural/Chemical, Confectionery, Food And Beverage, Lawn And Garden, Industrial, Medical/Nutrition And Office/Schools. The Company S Offices And Production Facilities Are IN Greensboro, N.C.

label: north-carolina-asahi
description: Founded IN 1996, North Carolina Asahi Focuses On The Production Of Wiper Linkages. It Is Comprised Of More Than 130 Employees And Maintains An Over 1,700-Square-Foot Manufacturing Space. The Company Is A Part Of Denso North America, Which Is One Of The Leading Suppliers Of Advanced Automotive Technologies, Systems And Components For Various Automakers IN The World. Denso North America Has Operations IN Nearly 30 Countries And Employs Approximately 17,000 People. With Annual Sales Of More Than $40 Billion, Its Clients Include Mercedes-Benz, Toyota Motor Corporation, Harley-Davidson, Mack Trucks And Caterpillar Incorporated. The Parent Company Also Operates Denso Manufacturing Canada, Denso Wireless Systems America And Denso Sales California.

label: norcomp-inc
description: Norcomp Is A Leader IN The Design And Worldwide Manufacture And Marketing Of I/O Interconnect Products. As An Innovative Interconnect Solutions Manufacturer, Norcomp Offers A Wide Range Of Premium Machined, Rugged, Higher Reliability Connectors For Harsh Environments IN Industrial, Medical, Military And Computer Markets.

label: ngk-ceramics-usa-inc
description: Founded IN 2003, Ngk Automotive Ceramics, U.S.A., Is A Subsidiary Of Ngk Insulators Ltd, Which Is A Ceramic Technology Company. It Offers High-Performance Components For Emission Control Systems To Automobile And Heavy-Duty Diesel Manufacturers. It Is Equipped With Canning And Press Machines, As Well As Offers Diesel Engine Exhaust, Electric Furnace And Thermal Shock-Resistant Systems. Ngk Automotive Ceramics, U.S.A. Provides Information On Exhaust Systems, Such As Ceramic Substrates And Sensor Technologies. The Company S Products Provide Catalyst And Engine Control Services. It Also Offers Diesel Particulate Filters That Are Thermal Shock Resistant. Ngk Automotive Ceramics, U.S.A. Provides Wall Flow Particulate Filters That Minimize Soot Emissions. It Additionally Offers Publications And Technical Information On Ceramic Substrates And Diesel Filters.

label: nevins-inc
description: Nevins Is A Nonprofit Organization That Serves More Than 400 Individuals With Developmental Disabilities. It Serves Individuals With Various Developmental Disabilities, Such As Mental Retardation And Illness, Epilepsy, Traumatic Brain Injury, Autism And Learning Disabilities. Nevins  Community Alternatives Program Is An Adult Day Support Program That Provides Assistance With Acquisition, Improvement And Retention Of Adaptive, Socialization And Self-Help Skills. The Organization Also Features Rehabilitation And Employment Programs. It Is Accredited By The Commission On Accreditation Of Rehabilitation Facilities IN Organizational And Community Employment And Older Adult Services.

label: nestaway
description: Established IN 1945, Nestaway Offers Design, Forming, Welding And Coating Services. Headquartered IN Cleveland, The Company Maintains A More Than 330,000-Square-Foot Facility. Its Houseware Products Include Items, Such As Countertop Dish Drainers, Sink Racks, Shelves, Stacking Baskets And Bail Handles. Nestaway Also Provides Stainless Steel Baskets Used For Medical Instrument Sterilization And Dryer Racks. The Company Additionally Offers Fabrication, Tooling, Prototyping And Machining Services, As Well As Has An Engineering Team. It Provides Products To Original Equipment Manufacturers. The Company Serves The Appliance And Houseware Industries And Maintains A Sales Department. With One Of Its Manufacturing Locations IN Clinton, N.C., Nestaway Also Serves Customers IN Kentucky And Tennessee.

label: nederman-mikro-pul-llc
description: Established IN 1929, Mikropul Is One Of The Leading Manufacturers Of Dust Control And Product Recovery Products, From Small Unit Collectors To Complete Engineered Systems, For Industrial Applications Throughout The World. With More Than 200,000 Installations, The Company S Broad Scope Of Technologies And Global Resources Allow It To Meet Almost Every Filtration OR Gas-Cleaning Requirement. The Principle Industries Served Include: Cement/Rock Products; Chemical Processing; Food/Pharmaceutical; Mining And Minerals; Primary And Secondary Metals; And Power Generation.

label: nederman
description: Dantherm Filtration Combines The Experience Of Four Internationally Recognized Suppliers, Nordfab, Airrmaster, Bmd Garant And Cattinair. The Company Supplies Air Cleaning And Dust Extraction Solutions For A Range Of Industries Throughout The World. It Focuses On Individual Solutions For Individual Customer Needs. Dantherm Filtration Offers A Variety Services Throughout The Project Cycle, Including Design, Engineering, Project Planning, Installation, Commissioning And Lifetime Service And Maintenance.

label: ncfi-polyurethanes
description: Ncfi Polyurethanes Formulates And Manufactures Foam-IN-Place Polyurethane Foam Systems. It Sells And Services Foam Mixing And Dispensing Equipment To End-Users On A National Basis. When It Was Founded 1964, Ncfi Manufactured Flexible Foams For The Bedding And Furniture Industry. IN 1967, It Began Formulating Foam-IN-Place Systems For Cold Storage Insulation. Since Then, Applications For Its Products Have Expanded Into The Commercial Roofing, Residential Wall Insulation, Marine Flotation, Packaging, Taxidermy And Specialty Molding Industries. IN Addition, Nasa Insulates Its Space Shuttle Fuel Tanks With Ncfi Foam-IN-Place Polyurethane Foam. Ncfi Is A Division Of Barnhardt Manufacturing Company, A Charlotte, N.C., Manufacturer Of Fiber Cushioning Materials And Specialty Cotton Textiles. Ncfi Is Based IN Mount Airy, N.C.

label: nationwide-custom-homes
description: Founded IN 1959, Nationwide Homes Is A Manufacturer Of Modular Homes. The Company Provides A Variety Of Custom-Manufactured Homes For Single, Multifamily And Group Housing Applications. It Offers Design Layout, Specialty Manufacturing, Paint Treatment, Construction, Erection, Finishing And Marketing Support Services. Its Additional Services Include Material Procurement, Sawmilling, Fabrication, Drilling, Cutting And Assembling. It Also Offers Maintenance And Repairs IN Addition To Custom Furnishing And Decorating Services. It Provides Modular Homes To Individual And Commercial Clients, Including Builders, Contractors And Distributors. The Company Also Operates An Online Shopping Store. Nationwide Homes Has One Of Its Offices Located IN Siler City, N.C.

label: national-pipe-&-plastics-inc
description: National Pipe & Plastics Inc. Has Been Producing Polyvinyl Chloride (Pvc) Pipe For Residential, Agricultural, Commercial, Municipal And Export Markets Since 1970. The Company Is One Of The Largest Polyvinyl Chloride Pipe Producers IN North America. National Pipe & Plastics Inc.'s Wide Range Of Products Include; Gravity Sewer Pipe, Electrical Conduit, Utility Duct Used By Electric Utilities, Pressure Water Pipe Used For Water Distribution, Irrigation, As Well As Golf Courses. IN Addition, The Company Offers Polyvinyl Chloride Duct, Which Is Sold To Telephone Companies And Sewer And Drainpipe, Used For Water Drainage.

label: nascar-illustrated
description: Nascar Scene Is A Magazine That Offers Information On Nationwide Race Series. The Magazine Includes More Than 80 Pages And Is Published Over 50 Times Annually. It Features Data On Race Reports, News And Statistics. The Magazine Also Offers Information On Nascar S Craftsmen Truck And Sprint Cup Series. Nascar Scene Additionally Includes The Details Of Tracks, Schedules And Results Of Races. The Magazine Is The Publication Of American City Business Journals.

label: mt-olive-pickle-co
description: Mt. Olive Pickle Company, Since 1926, Has Grown To Be The Best Selling Brand Of Pickles IN The Southeast And The Second-Best Selling Brand Of Non-Refrigerated Pickles IN The Country. Mt. Olive S Products Can Be Found From Florida To Maine, The Midwest, And Western States Including Texas, Colorado, California And Hawaii. Mt. Olive Packs And Sells More Than 80 Million Jars Of Processed And Fresh Packed Pickles, Peppers And Relishes Each Year. The Company Uses 120 Million Pounds Of Cucumbers And Peppers Annually. The Company Has Developed Close Ties At Home With The Community Of Mount Olive, N.C. As Well As A Productive Relationship With Educational Institutions IN The Fields Of Horticulture, Food Science And Engineering. Mt. Olive Pickle Company Maintains Its Own Direct Sales Force That Manages A Network Of Food Brokers To Sell Its Products Throughout Its 44-State Market Area.

label: moyer-diebel
description: Moyer Diebel Boasts More That A Half A Century Of Experience IN The Glasswashing And Dishwashing Industry. The Machines Produced By Moyer Diebel Are Used IN Casinos, Major Hotels And Bars. Smaller Restaurants Find That The Company S Glasswashers Can Save Labor Costs, Reduce Glass Breakage And Increase Efficiency. The Company, Located IN Winston-Salem, N.C., Also Produces A Wide Array Of Automatic Bar Glasswashers, Undercounter Dishwashers And Door-Type Dishwashers For The Commercial Food Service Industry. Although Moyer Diebel Makes Its Home IN Winston-Salem, Its Affiliation Is Part Of The Ali Group Of Foodservice Equipment Companies, Which Gives It A Worldwide Reach.

label: moll-industries-inc
description: Moll Industries Is One Of North America S Largest And Most Experienced Plastic Injection Molders/Manufacturers That Delivers Value-Added Business Solutions, Products And Process Optimizations. The Company Serves Major Medical, Appliances And Consumer Products Markets. It Utilizes Six Sigma Engineering Experience And Lean Manufacturing To Yield Results For Customers And To Produce Precision-Performing Products. For More Than 60 Years, Moll Industries Has Provided Solutions For The Plastics Industry.

label: mohawk-industries-inc
description: Mohawk Industries, Located IN Laurel Hill, N.C., Is One Of More Than 250 Regional Distribution Facilities For Mohawk Industries, A Leading Supplier Of Flooring For Both Residential And Commercial Applications. The Company Offers A Complete Selection Of Broadloom Carpet, Ceramic Tile, Wood, Stone, Laminate, Vinyl, Rugs And Other Home Products. These Products Are Marketed Under A Number Of Recognized Brands IN The Industry, Which Include Mohawk, Karastan, Ralph Lauren, Lees, Bigelow, Dal-Tile And American Olean. Mohawk Industries Has Corporate Headquarters IN Calhoun, Ga., And Is Traded Publicly On The New York Stock Exchange Under The Ticker Symbol Mhk.

label: minges-bottling-group-inc
description: Minges Bottling Group Is A Subsidiary Of The Pepsi Bottling Group, A Manufacturer, Seller And Distributor Of Pepsi-Cola Beverages. With Nearly $11 Billion IN Annual Sales, The Company Delivers Nearly 200 Million Eight-Ounce Servings Of Pepsi-Cola Beverages Each Day. IN Addition To Carbonated Beverages, The Company Also Has A Portfolio Of Non-Carbonated Drinks, Including Aquafina, Tropicana Juice Drinks, Lipton Iced Tea, Starbucks Frappuccino And Doubleshot, The Sobe Line Of Beverages And Dole Single-Serve Juices And Blends. Beginning IN March 1999, The Pepsi Bottling Group Became A Publicly Traded On The New York Stock Exchange Under The Symbol Pbg. It Operates IN The United States, Canada, Greece, Mexico, Russia, Spain And Turkey. The Pepsi Bottling Group Is Headquartered IN Somers, N.Y., And Minges Bottling Group Is Located IN Ayden, N.C.

label: mills-manufacturing-corp
description: Mills Manufacturing Corporation Is A Manufacturer Of Military Parachutes. The Company Has Provided Special Products For Military Use Since 1935. It Offers A Broad Variety Of Basic Military Parachutes And Is Able To Customize Parachutes For Individual Needs. The Company S Products Include Parachutes For Airborne Troops, Cargo Parachutes, Extraction Parachutes And Deceleration Parachutes. Mills Manufacturing Corporation Operates A Manufacturing Complex Of More Than 150,000 Square Feet. The Company Performs All Work Associated With The Manufacture, Inspection, Testing And Packaging Of Parachutes, With Exception Of The Purchase Orders For Raw Materials, Such As Webbing, Cloth And Hardware. Its Primary Supplier Of Nylon Cord Is The Company S Miltex Subsidiary. Mills Manufacturing Corporation Is Located IN Asheville, N.C.

label: mgm-brakes
description: Mgm Brakes, A Division Of Indian Head Industries, Is A Supplier To The Commercial Vehicle Industry. It Manufactures And Distributes Spring Parking Brakes And Actuators For Air-Braked Vehicles. It Offers Nearly 20 Different Models Of Spring Brakes, Including Double-Diaphragm And Piston-Style Models, Remote-Mount Actuators And Service Chambers. Mgm Brakes Is A Supplier To The Domestic And Global Trucks, Trailers, Buses And Specialty Vehicles Manufacturers. Its E-Stroke Video Highlights All The Features And Benefits Of Its Electronic Brake Monitoring System. This System Provides Wheel And Problem-Specific Information Regarding The Status Of Actuators On Buses, Trucks And Trailers To Drivers And Maintenance Personnel.

label: metso-automation-usa-inc
description: Metso Power Designs And Manufactures Chemical Recover And Power Generation System For The Global Pulp And Paper Industry And Power Generation, Utilities And Process Industries. Its Products Include Recovery And Power Boilers, Evaporators, Environmental Systems And Service. The Company Maintains More Than 300 Recovery Boilers And 300 Evaporation Unit Deliveries, And Has Designed And Manufactured The World S Largest Recovery Unites. Metso Power Delivers Power Boilers Worldwide And Offers A Wide Range Of Boilers For Different Needs, From Small Units To Giant Tailor-Made Boilers. Metso Power Maintains United States Offices IN Charlotte, N.C.

label: metromont
description: Operational For More Than 75 Years, Metromont Corporation Provides Construction Services Throughout The Southeast. The Company Offers Architectural And Structural Building Systems With High-End Architectural Finishes That Include Brick, Sandblasting, Formliners And Custom Color Concrete Mix Designs. It Provides A Range Of Architectural Concrete Products That Includes Column Covers, Custom Shapes, And Flat And Curved Panels. Metromont Corporation S Prestressed Concrete Products Include Wall Panels, Columns, Beams And Flat Slabs. The Company Offers Products For Schools, Parking Structures, Office Buildings, Multifamily Residences, Mixed-Use Structures, Sports And Entertainment Venues, And Warehouse And Distribution Facilities. With Its Corporate Office IN Greenville, S.C., Metromont Corporation Maintains A Location IN Charlotte, N.C.

label: merz-aesthetics-inc
description: Bioform Medical Is A Medical Aesthetics Company IN California. It Focuses On Developing And Commercializing Products That Are Used By Physicians To Enhance A Patient S Appearance. It Provides Radiesse, Which Is A Dermal Filler That Is Used For The Correction Of Wrinkles And Folds. The Company Offers Radiesse Voice And Radiesse Voice Gel For The Treatment Of Vocal Fold Insufficiency. Bioform Medical Also Provides Coaptite Injectable Implant, Which Is A Periurethral Bulking Agent Designed To Treat Women Who Have Stress Urinary Incontinence Due To The Improper Functioning Of Urethral Sphincter Muscles. It Sells Aethoxysklerol Sclerosing Agent, Which Is An Injectable Drug Used For The Treatment Of Varicose Veins.

label: meridian-specialty-yarn-group
description: Meridian Specialty Yarn Group Specializes IN Novelty Yarn Manufacturing And Dyeing. The Company Operates Production Plants IN North Carolina. One Of Its Production Plants Specializes IN Package Dyeing That Dyes Every Fiber Substrate Along With Technical Products, Such As High Ultraviolet And Other Specialty Polyesters. Its Other Plant Specializes IN Working With Designers To Create A Range Of Products For Industrial Weavers, Knitters And The Hand-Knitting Market. Meridian Specialty Yarn Group Is A Member Of Meridian Industries, Which Is A Family-Owned Diversified Manufacturing Group That Was Founded IN 1943. Meridian Industries Is Comprised Of Five Operating Companies That Include Aurora Specialty Textiles Group, Kent Elastomer Products, Kleen Test Products Corporation, Majilite Corporation And Meridian Specialty Yarn Group.

label: meridian-brick
description: With An Annual Production Capacity Of More Than 1.7 Billion Bricks, Hanson Brick Is One Of North America's Largest Brick Manufacturing Companies That Offers A Range Of Products For Homeowners, Homebuyers, Builders, Contractors, Distributors, Dealers And Architects. It Provides Over 1,000 Styles Of Brick IN Nearly Five Regional Brick Collections. Hanson Brick Oversees A Professional Staff Of Approximately 1,600 Employees. It Operates Manufacturing Facilities IN The States Of Kentucky, Louisiana, Michigan, North Carolina, South Carolina And Texas. The Company Also Supplies Concrete Roof Tile IN Various Sizes And Colors For Single And Multifamily Developments, Custom Homes, Re-Roofing Applications And Commercial Projects Through Its Subsidiary Company, Hanson Roof Tile. Additionally, Hanson Brick Organizes A Variety Of Trade Shows. Headquartered IN Charlotte, N.C., The Company Maintains A Location IN Monroe, N.C.

label: meridian-brick
description: Hanson Brick & Tile Is One Of North America S Largest Brick And Concrete Roof Tile Manufacturers. The Company Has A Capacity Of More Than 1.7 Billion Bricks From 25 Plants. It Offers Five Regional Brick Collections That Include More Than 1,000 Styles Of Brick. Hanson Brick & Tile Has Headquarters IN Charlotte, N.C., And Plants IN Kentucky, Michigan, North Carolina, South Carolina And Texas. It Also Has Plants IN Ontario And Quebec. The Facility IN Pleasant Garden, N.C., Is A Sales Office And Brick Plant. The Company Also Supplies Concrete Roof Tile IN Various Sizes And Colors For Single And Multi-Family Developments, Custom Homes And Re-Roofing Applications. It Produces Tile From Six Plants IN California, Arizona And Florida. Hanson Brick & Tile Is Part Of Hanson, An International Heavy Building Materials Company, With Operations IN 14 Countries. Hanson Is One Of The World S Largest Producers Of Aggregates And Concrete Products, Clay Bricks And Ready-Mixed Concrete.

label: meredith-webb-printing-co
description: Meredith-Webb Printing Company Is A Commercial Printing Company With Services Ranging From Direct Mail To Packaging. It Offers A Range Of Prepress, Pressroom, Packaging, Bindery And Finishing Services For Clients Throughout North Carolina. Located IN Burlington, N.C., Meredith-Webb Printing Company S Main Facility Houses Its Line Of Presses, Including The Roland 900 Series Press, Which Can Handle Sheet Sizes As Big As 40 Inches By 56 Inches. The Company S Presses Also Have Aqueous And Ultraviolet Coating Capabilities. Meredith-Webb Printing Company Has Been IN Business For More Than 20 Years.

label: measurement-inc
description: Measurement Incorporated Is An Employee-Owned Corporation That Contracts With State And Local Departments Of Education, Other Educational Agencies And Private Businesses To Develop And Score Educational Tests. The Company Is Recognized As The Nation S Leading Provider Of Professional Hand Scoring Services For Essays And Open-Ended Exams. It Has Also Developed A Full Range Of Capabilities To Support All Facets Of Assessment Of Students IN Kindergarten Through College And At The Professional Level. Headquartered IN Durham, N.C., Measurement Maintains 13 Offices IN Nine States And Employs More Than 300 Full-Time Staff IN Addition To Hundreds Of Seasonal Employees That Assist IN Assessment Scoring, Item Development And Materials Handling. The Company Is Organized Into Seven Main Departments: Test Development, Scoring, Information Technology, Program Evaluation, Software Products, Materials Management And Administration.

label: mcmichael-mills
description: Founded IN 1993, Mcmichael Mills Manufactures And Distributes A Range Of Covered Elastic Yarns That Are Produced By Wrapping Nylon, Cotton, Polyester And Other Fibers Around A Spandex And Latex Rubber Core. Its Yarns Are Used By The Hosiery, Fabric And Medical Trade Markets For The Production Of Socks, Bra Straps, Waistbands And Bandages. The Company Includes A Manufacturing Plant And Warehouse. Mcmichael Mills Produces More Than 500 Single-, Double- And Air-Covered Elastic Yarns.

label: mckenzie-sports-products-llc
description: Mckenzie Taxidermy Supply Offers A Full Line Of Taxidermy Materials To Professional And Amateur Taxidermists. Its Wide Array Of Products Includes Forms, Mounting Stands, Modeling Tools, Artificial Noses, Cast Lips, Painting Supplies, Adhesives, Antler Systems And Knives. Its Mounts And Forms Are Designed For Nearly Any North American Game, Including Birds, Deer, Bears, Elk And Mountain Lions. Mckenzie Also Offers Instructional Videos And Reference Books On Hunting And Taxidermy. Trophies Mounted With Mckenzie Products Have Won Numerous Awards Over The Years. Mckenzie Taxidermy Supply Is A Division Of Mckenzie Sports Products. Its 30,000-Square-Foot Distribution Facility Is Located IN Caldwell, Texas.

label: mccrary-acme-corp
description: Acme-Mccrary Corporation Is A Manufacturing Company That Offers A Range Of Legwear And Was Established IN 1909. It Has A Production Capability Of More Than 110,000 Dozen Pairs Of Hosiery Per Week And Over 96,000 Pieces Of Seamless Garments Per Week. The Company Has Various Marketing And Design Teams That Assist IN The Development Of New Product Ideas And Enhancements From Concept To Completion. Acme-Mccrary Corporation Provides Market Research, Fashion Forecasting And Design Direction Services. It Operates On-Site Corporate Recreational Facilities With Heated Pool And Exercise Equipment, As Well As Offers Fitness Classes To Its Employees And Their Families. The Company Works IN Partnership With Sapona Manufacturing Company, Which Specializes IN The Production Of Covered Spandex Fibers And Textured Nylon.

label: mayo-knitting-mill
description: Founded IN 1932, Mayo Knitting Mill Inc. Is A Manufacturer Of Socks For Women, Men And Children. Based IN Tarboro, N.C., The Firm Owns And Maintains Tow Manufacturing Facilities. It Provides Private-Label Manufactures To Retailers And Also Handles Contract Knitting Projects For Major Brands. The Company Manufactures Socks For Athletic, Boot And Casual Crew Purposes While Also Manufacturing Knee-High Socks. It Offers A Wide Range Of Seasonal, Basic Assortment And Custom-Made Socks IN Gauge Cotton, Fancy Microfibers, European Yarns And Other Performance Yarns.

label: marsh-furniture-co
description: Marsh Furniture Company Provides A Full Range Of Kitchen And Bath Cabinetry. The Company Features The March Cabinets Framed Line And High Point Cabinetry Full-Access Line. It Offers More Than 100 Styles Of Cherry, Maple, Oak And Birch, As Well As Thermo Foil And Painted Finishes. Marsh Furniture Has Operated Since 1906 And Is Based IN High Point, N.C. The Company Offers Cabinetry Constructed Of Solid Wood, Beautiful Veneers And Laminated Products. The Natural Woods And Veneers Are Presented To Suit Personal Tastes. It Also Offers Beveled Glass. Marsh Also Supplies Accessories, Such As Plate Racks, Bookcases, Desk Organizers, Utility Cabinets And Bottle Holders.

label: manual-woodworkers-&-weavers
description: Established IN 1932, Manual Woodworkers & Weavers Is A Privately Owned Manufacturer And Wholesale Distributor Of Gift And Decorative Accessories. It Provides Home Decoration Products, Luggage And Handbags, And Canvas And Tapestry Wall Hangings. The Company S Inventory Includes Aprons, Display Fixtures, Ebony Art Closets, Hand Towels, Towel Ring And Racks And Mini Plates. Manual Woodworkers & Weavers Offers Handbags IN Various Collections, Including April Cornell, Antique Floral, Back To The Garden, Kimberly Poloson, Baroque Enchantment, Brown Lauren And Cabana. It Provides Various Products For Children That Include Picture Pillows, Fleece Baby Blankets And Sets And Totes.

label: mannington-mills-inc
description: Mannington Laminate Floors Is A Part Of Mannington Mills, Which Manufactures And Distributes A Variety Of Home Furnishing Products, As Well As Interior And Exterior Decoration Materials. The Company Offers Custom-Manufactured Doors And Windows, Specialty Roofing And Flooring Products, And Decking And Sidings. Mannington Laminate Floors Provides Custom-Designed Hardwood Floors And Porcelain Tiles. It Offers A Variety Of Services, Such As Design Assistance, Specialty Manufacturing, Custom Finishing, Paint Treatment And Customer Support. Its Brands Include Adura, Scratchresist, Guardian And Icore. The Company's Areas Of Operation Include Lumber Procurement, Sawing, Cutting, Molding, Fabrication, Decoration, Packaging, Warehousing And Distribution. Mannington Laminate Floors Has One Of Its Stores Located IN High Point, N.C.

label: mack-molding
description: Mack Molding Is A Supplier Of Contract Manufacturing Services And Injection Molded Plastic Parts To Companies IN The Medical, Commercial, Computer And Business Equipment, Transportation And Large Tonnage Industries. Its Specialties Include Plastics Design, Prototyping, Molding, Sheet Metal Fabrication And Turnkey System Assembly. Mack S Client List Includes Small- And Mid-Sized Companies, As Well As Fortune 500 Giants, Such As Tyco Healthcare, Ibm, Sun Microsystems, Kenworth Truck Company And Alcon. Mack Molding's Northern Operations, Headquartered IN Arlington, Vt., Includes Four Injection Molding Facilities IN Vermont And Massachusetts And A Warehouse IN Pownal, Vt. Its Southern Operations Are Comprised Of Two Plants IN Inman, S.C., And Statesville, N.C. The Company Has A Total Of Approximately 950 Employees. Founded IN 1920, Mack Molding Is A Wholly Owned Subsidiary Of The Mack Group Corporation, Which Also Includes The Mack Technologies, Mack Design And Mack Prototype Divisions.

label: machine-specialties-inc
description: Machine Specialties, Also Known As Msi, Has Been Providing Contract Machining And Metal Finishing Services Since 1969. It Maintains A More Than 40,000-Square-Foot Manufacturing Facility. The Company Is An Iso 9001:2000-Certified Organization. Machine Specialties Also Provides Milling, Mechanical Assembling, Grinding, Turning And Prototyping Services. The Company Additionally Offers Anodization, Heat Treating, Plating And Painting Solutions. It Employs A Staff Of Purchasing Managers, Manufacturing Engineers And Machinists And Operates A Human Resources Department.

label: mac-lean-curtis-llc
description: Curtis Screw Premier Precision Plant, Located IN Cornelius, N.C., And Founded IN 1980, Is One Of The Facilities Of Curtis Screw Company. It Is A More Than 50,000-Square-Foot Plant That Offers Multiple Spindle Screws And Large Diameter Concentrator Machining, Secondary Operations And Light Assembly. Curtis Screw Company, Founded IN 1905, Is A Manufacturer Of Precision Screw-Machined Components And Assemblies For Global Distribution. The Company S Products Include Precision-Machined Swiss And Multiple Spindle Screw Machine Parts For Various Industries. Its Products Include Precision-Machined Automotive Components, Swiss-Machined Medical And Military Components, Electrical And Electronic Connectors And Communication Components.

label: m-t-co
description: Michael Thomas Was Founded IN 1983 To Manufacture Upholstered Furniture With The Finest Components Available. Its Hardwood Frames Employ Fully Eight-Way Hand Tied Coil Springs For Durable Seating Comfort. Super Spring-Down Cushioning Is Standard. The Fabrics Are Match IN The Front And All The Way Around The Piece. Most Styles Can Be Chosen IN Fabric, Leather OR A Combination Of Fabric And Leather. Michael Thomas Has Sofas, Many Available As Sleepers, And Occasional Chairs For Any Room IN The Home. The Company Has More Than 450 Dealers Nationwide.

label: m-b-industries-inc
description: Incorporated Was Founded IN 1985, Mb Industries Inc. Is The Producer Of Welding And Metalwork Consumables. It Provides The Innovative And Cost Effective Products For Welding And Metallurgical Industries, Which Help Welders And Metalworkers To Do Their Job Without Expending Their Time For Second Operation Work. The Company S Product Range Includes Spatter-Spatter, Spatter-Dip, Whitewater-Coolant, Spatter-Kool, D-Spat And 100c Coolant. Some Of The Clients Of Mb Industries Inc. Include Crown, Honda, Gm, Chrysler Basiloid, Kawasaki, Ford Motor CO, General Motors, Brown Mgf, Nelson Muffler And North American Mfg Ltd.

label: lyndon-steel-co-lp
description: Lyndon Steel Company, Headquartered IN Winston Salem, N.C., Has Been A Specialist IN The Structural Steel Industry For More Than 25 Years. The Company Is A Fabricator Of Structural And Miscellaneous Steel And A Supplier Of Joist And Deck. It Principally Serves The Commercial, Retail And Industrial Construction Needs Of Local And National Clients. Lyndon Steel Produces More Than 25,000 Tons Of Fabricated Steel Each Year IN One Of Its Three Plants, Which Contain Cnc Automated Equipment. The Company Also Has An IN-House Engineering Department That Utilizes Sds2. These Technologies Enable The Company To Support Fast-Track Construction. Lyndon Steel Company Has Aisc Certification For Complex Structures. Lyndon Steel Company Has Completed Work IN Approximately 40 States.

label: lubrizol-advanced-materials
description: Lubrizol Advanced Materials Is A Global Producer Of Advanced Specialty Chemicals, Polymer-Based Formulations And Chemical Additives For A Range Of Consumer And Industrial Applications. The Company's Products Are Used IN Personal Care, Pharmaceutical And Household Cleaning Products; Paints And Coatings, Inks, Overprint Varnishes, Specialty Papers, Adhesives And Textiles; Residential And Commercial Plumbing And Fire Sprinkler Systems; Film And Sheet, Wire And Cable, Medical Applications And Automobile Molded Parts; Static Control For Electronic Applications; Antioxidants And Accelerators For Rubber, Plastic, And Lubricants; Colorants, Preservatives, Flavors, And Fragrances; Foam Control For Food Processing And Industrial Applications; Explosives; And A Wide Range Of Water-Soluble Polymers. Lubrizol Advanced Materials Has Its Headquarters IN Cleveland, Regional Centers IN Brussels, Belgium, And Hong Kong And Nearly 30 Manufacturing Locations Throughout The World.

label: lns-turbo-inc
description: Lns Turbo Is A Supplier Of Chip And Coolant Management Systems. Serving The Machine Tool Industry Since 1977, Turbo Designs And Manufactures Chip Removal And Coolant Filtration Systems To Maximize Machine Productivity. It Offers A Full Range Of Conveyor Models With Coolant Tanks, Tramp Oil Removal, Coolant Filtration, Low Pressure And High Pressure Coolant Pumps And Secondary Filtration. Along With Its Standard Product Lines, It Also Manufactures Subcontract Fabricated Parts. Its On-Site Engineering And Complete Manufacturing Capabilities From Laser Cutting To Paint Make Lns Turbo A Premier Sheet Metal Supplier. It S Headquartered Near Charlotte, N.C.
