IN The Town Of Kings Mountain. Together With Facilities IN Cherryville, N.C. And Barnsley, England, More Than 150,000 Square Feet Of State-Of-The-Art Equipment Is Available To Serve Its Customers.

label: lisk-trucking-inc
description: Lisk Trucking Specializes IN The Transportation Of Dry Bulk Products. It Operates A Fleet Of More Than 80 Tractors And Over 100 Trailers, Which Moves Goods To Various Locations More Than 40 U.S. States And Canada. The Company Offers Its Drivers A Range Of Employment Benefits That Includes Paid Vacations, Quarterly Bonuses, And Life And Health Insurance. Lisk Trucking Was Founded IN 1973 By Howard Lisk And His Sons. It Maintains A Service And Repair Facility IN Wadesboro, N.C.

label: lions-services-inc
description: Lions Services Provides Vocational Rehabilitation And Employment Opportunities To Individuals Who Are Blind OR Visually Impaired. The Organization Also Provides Eye Care For Those Within The Community Who Need Financial Assistance. Lions Services Began Operations IN 1935 And The Following Year It Was Established As The Charlotte Workshop For The Blind By The Charlotte Central Lions Club. IN 1975, The Company Was Incorporated As A Nonprofit Textile Manufacturer To Employ Blind Workers And Became Known As Lions Services. IN Addition, Lsi Is A Manufacturer Of Products For The Department Of Defense And An Affiliate Of National Industries For The Blind. It Is Based IN Charlotte, N.C.

label: leviton-manufacturing-co-inc
description: Leviton Manufacturing Was Founded IN 1906 To Manufacture Tip Mantles For Gas Lights. Since Then, The Company Has Become One Of The Leading North American Producers Of Electrical And Electronic Products. Its Product Offering Comprises More Than 20,000 Distinct Catalog Numbers. The Company Serves The Industrial, Commercial, Original Equipment Manufactures And Residential Markets. Its Lighting Management System Division Develops Innovative Solutions Applied To Energy Management Initiatives For Large Scale And Small-Scale Commercial Customers. Leviton Manufacturing Also Offers Architectural And Theatrical Dimming Systems, Including Dimming Cabinets, Racks, Control Consoles And Systems. Headquartered IN Little Neck, N.Y., Leviton Manufacturing Has A Location IN Jefferson, N.C.

label: leonard-buildings
description: Founded IN 1963, Leonard Offers A Range Of Truck Accessories, Such As Bug Deflectors, Front Hitches, Fog Lights, Grille Guards, Headlights, License Plates And Winches. It Maintains Over 50 Locations Throughout The United States. The Company Offers Truck Covers For Various Makes, Such As Dodge, Ford, Nissan, Toyota And Honda. It Also Provides A Line Of Enclosed And Open Trailers That Feature Plywood Walls And Bowed Roofs. The Company Operates A Trailer Service Center That Offers Floorboard Maintenance And Brake System Inspection Solutions. It Additionally Provides Vinyl Garages And Specialty Carports. Leonard Manufactures Portable Utility Buildings And Gazebos. The Company Provides Building Materials To Clients IN The Southeast.

label: lenoir-mirror-co
description: Established IN 1913, Lenoir Mirror Company Is One Of The World S Leading Commercial And Wholesale Mirror Manufacturers IN The Domestic Mirror And Fabricated Glass Industry. It Caters To A Variety Of Customers, Including Furniture, Medicine Cabinet, Specialty And Mirror Door Manufacturers As Well As Mobile Home Distributors, Glass Distributors, Mirror Dealers And Construction Product Suppliers. The Company Also Offers A Wide Range Of Individual As Well As Bulk Packaging Options. Lenoir Mirror Company Has Affiliations With The Glass Association Of America, Glass Association Of North America, Goliath Knowledge On Demand And Proz - The Translators Workplace, To Name A Few.

label: leggett-&-platt-inc
description: Leggett & Platt Was Formed IN 1883 As A Business Partnership Between J.P. Leggett And C.B. Platt. Leggett Was An Inventor And Had Several Patents To His Credit. When He Developed The Idea For A Spiral Steel Coil Bedspring, Leggett Went To His Brother-IN-Law, Platt, For His Manufacturing Capability And Expertise. The Company Designs And Manufactures A Variety Of Engineered Components And Products, Including Retail Store Fixtures And Point-Of-Purchase Displays, Carpet Underlay, Adjustable Beds, Components For Office Furniture, Non-Automotive Aluminum Die Castings, Drawn Steel Wire, Components For Residential Furniture And Bedding, Automotive Seat Support And Lumbar Systems, And Bedding Industry Machinery For Wire Forming, Sewing And Quilting. The Company Reported Sales Of More Than $5 Billion IN 2006 And Is Ranked On The Fortune 500. Leggett & Platt Employs Approximately 33,000 People At More Than 300 Facilities IN More Than 20 Countries, Including A Location IN Lexington, N.C.

label: lee-industries
description: Lee Industries Offers Furniture IN Fabrics And Leathers. IN 1969, Bill And Dottie Coley Decided To Manufacture Furniture Built To The Quality Standard They Wanted For Their Own Home. They Opened A 7500-Square-Foot Factory, Hired 10 People And Lee Industries Was Open. The Company Has Been Featured IN Magazines Such As Do It Yourself, Cottage Living, Array, Shop Etc., Country Living, Country Home And Better Homes & Gardens Decorating. Lee Uses Steel-Coil Springs IN Its Eight-Way Hand-Tied Seat Decks. This Keeps The Springs From Shifting And Creating Uncomfortable Lumps And Bumps. Each Spring Is Supported By Polypropylene And Steel Strapping To Provide Customers With Long Lasting And Comfortable Seating. Lee Industries Is Headquartered And Has Three Plants IN Newton, N.C.

label: lee-brick-&-tile
description: Lee Brick Is A Family-Owned Company That Serves Several Residential Customers. It Offers Bricks IN A Variety Of Styles, Such As Meadow Rose, Saddlebrook, Pinehurst, Prestonwood, Pamlico And Halifax. Lee Brick Maintains A Network Of Dealers And Distributors Throughout The United States. The Company Also Provides Camelot, Deep River, Oriental, Savannah, Carbonton And Sienna Bricks. Lee Brick Offers Delivery And Shipping Services.

label: lc-industries-inc
description: Lc Industries Is One Of The Largest Employers Of Visually Impaired Individuals IN The United States. It Offers A Range Of Cleaning, Office And Janitorial Supplies. The Company Is A Nonprofit Institution That Has Been IN Operation For More Than 70 Years. Lc Industries Employs A Staff Of Over 650 People. It Operates Manufacturing Facilities, Distribution Centers And Nearly 30 Retail Stores IN Over Five U.S. States. Lc Industries Distributes Products Under The Skilcraft Brand. The Company Offers A Variety Of Paper Products, Such As Cups, Facial Tissues, Napkins And Plates. It Also Provides Tape, Abrasives, Absorbents, Locks And Tools For Various Industrial Applications. Lc Industries Offers Online Order Placement And Shipping Services.

label: lancer-inc
description: Founded IN 1969, Lancer Is A Manufacturer Of Residential Sofas, Chairs And Other Furniture. The Company Markets Its Furniture Products Through Wholesale Distributors And A Network Of Independent Resellers. All Lancer Furniture Products Feature Interlocked Frames With Glued Corners, Built-IN And Decorative Legs And High-Density Foam Seats. IN Addition, Lancer Furniture Products Are Made With The Company S Propriety Regalflex D.I Coil Springs. The Regalflex D.I. Features Conical Upholstery Coils Locked Into Position On A Heavy Gauge Bottom Grid And Attached By Clips To Substantial Edge Wire Around The Construction's Upper Perimeter. Individual Coils Are Transversely Connected To Adjoining Coils By Helical Springs That Serve To Spread The Load Weight Evenly Across The Entire Seating Surface. The Company S Manufacturing Facility Includes A Frame Shop, A Foam-Fabricating Plant, Cut And Sew Plant And An Upholstery Plant. Lancer Maintains Its Manufacturing Facilities And Corporate Operations Center IN Star, N.C.

label: labeltec-inc
description: Founded IN 1980, Pharmaprint Is A Division Of Jr Cole Industries, Which Is A Full-Service Printing And Packaging Products Manufacturing Company. Pharmaprint Offers A Variety Of Services, Such As Multicolor Offset Printing, Letterpress, Flexography, Foil Stamping, Lamination And Binding. The Company Provides Various Prepress Services, Including Text Composition, Design Layout And Editing IN Addition To Specialty Printing. It Prints Decals, Labels, Tags, Inserts, Folding Cartons, Product Manuals And User Interface Products. Its Additional Services Include Packaging, Warehousing And Logistic Support. The Company Serves Several Clients, Such As Original Equipment Manufacturers Of Electronic Equipment, Medical Devices And Other Consumer Products, As Well As Health Care And Household Products Manufacturing Industries. Pharmaprint Has One Of Its Offices Located IN Charlotte, N.C.

label: kreber-inc
description: Kreber Offers A Range Of Photography Solutions. The Company Provides A Variety Of Fashion, Room Scene, Home And Lifestyle Photography Services. Kreber S Clients Include United Diary Farmers, Bed, Bath And Beyond, Kohler And Christmas Tree Shops. The Company Additionally Serves Owens Corning, Rod S Western Palace, Procter Silex And Sherwin Williams.

label: kordsa-inc
description: Kordsa Usa Is The United States Branch Of Kordsa International. Kordsa International Started Operations As Dupont-Sabanci International, Combining The Nylon Industrial Heavy Decitex Yarn And Tirecord Fabric Businesses Of E.I. Dupont DE Nemours Of The United States And Sabanci Holding Of Turkey. The Company Has Manufacturing Operations IN Seven Countries. Kordsa Is One Of The Largest Suppliers Of Nylon And Polyester Industrial Yarn, Tirecord, Single-End Cord And Industrial Fabrics. Its Capacity Is More Than 150,000 Metric Tons Per Annum, Approximately 15 Percent Of The Global Textile Rubber Reinforcement Industry. Kordsa Operates Nearly 10 Manufacturing Sites And Employs Approximately 3,000 People. Kordsa International Maintains It Headquarters IN Wilmington, Del. Kordsa Usa Is Located IN Laurel Hill, N.C.

label: kolcraft-enterprises-inc
description: Kolcraft Enterprises Started IN Chicago IN 1946 When Leo Koltun Made Playpen Pads Out Of Cotton Batting And Oilcloth Covers For Post-World War Ii Babies. IN 1949, He Found Himself With Surplus Padding And Invented The All-Around Crib And Playard Bumper Pad. A Period Of Rapid Growth Followed As The Company Expanded Into Manufacturing Other Types Of Pads, Including Crib Mattresses IN 1951. IN 1979, It Began Making Plastic Products With The Introduction Of The Carri-Cradle, The First Combination Plastic Infant Carrier And Rocker With A Carrying Handle. The Company Continued Its Expansion Into The Manufacture And Distribution Of Other Products, Including Playards, High Chairs, Walkers, Strollers, Bassinets, Bouncers, Swings And Juvenile Furniture. By 1994, Kolcraft Became One Of The Nation's Leading Suppliers Of Strollers.

label: kmberly-clark-corp
description: Kimberly-Clark, Located IN Hendersonville, N.C. Is A Regional Manufacturing, Distribution And Operations Facility For Its Parent Company, Kimberly-Clark, Which Maintains Headquarters IN Dallas. Kimberly-Clark Is A Global Manufacturer Of Brand Name Health And Hygiene Products, Such As Kleenex, Scott, Huggies, Pull-Ups, Kotex And Depend. The Hendersonville Facility Manufactures Nonwoven Materials Made From Synthetic Fibers. Its Products Include Diapers, Incontinence Products And Feminine Pads. Additionally, Hundreds Of Grades Of Nonwoven Fabrics Are Used IN A Variety Of Applications, Such As Flexible Packaging, Home Furnishings, Industrial Fabrics, Car Covers And Spill Control.

label: kinston-public-svc-dept
description: Located IN Kingston, N.C., The City Of Kinston's Department Of Public Services Provides A Range Of Services To Citizens. Its Services Include Cemetery Management, Electricity, Garbage And Waste Collection, Recycling And Pest Control. The Department Operates Thorough Electric, Energy, Fleet Maintenance, Solid Waste, Stormwater, Streets, Vector Control And Wastewater Divisions. Its Buildings And Grounds Section Is Responsible For The Repair And Maintenance Of Electrical, Plumbing, Heating And Ventilating Systems, Groundskeeping And Supervision Of Janitorial Cleaning Of Various Government Buildings. The Department S Water Division Specializes IN The Treatment Of Water. It Offers Commercial Solid Waste, Residential Garbage, Bulk Vegetative And Nonvegetative Trash And White Goods Removal Services Through Its Environment Services Division.

label: king-sash-&-door-inc
description: King Sash And Door Is A Distributor Of High-Quality Interior And Exterior Doors And Windows. The Company Is Located IN Mocksville, N.C. It Sells Various Brands Of Interior Doors That Include Woodgrain Millwork, Jeld-Wen And Trustile Interior. The Company Offers Its Services To Various Lumber And Building Supply Dealers. Additionally, It Sells The Vetter Brand Of Windows And Patio Doors. King Sash And Door Has A Staff Of Trained Professionals And Offers A Range Of Roof Windows And Folding Doors.

label: king-hickory-furniture-co
description: Operational Since 1958, King Hickory Furniture Specializes IN The Manufacture Of Fine Upholstered Furniture. Based Hickory, N.C., The Company Uses A Variety Of Material, Such As Rugs, Leathers, Extreme Decorative Nail Guide, Hair On Hide, Etc For Making Furniture. King Hickory Furniture Manufactures A Range Of Products, Such As Sofas, Chairs, Sleepers, Sectionals, Chaises, Settees, Ottomans Among Others. All Of The Company S Furnitures Are Manufactured IN Accordance To The Upholstered Furniture Action Council (Ufac) Methods.

label: kincaid-upholstery-plant
description: Kincaid Furniture Company, Founded IN 1946, Is A Furniture Manufacturer Located IN Taylorsville, N.C. The Company Offers A Wide Range Of Bedroom Furniture, Including Beds, Dressers, Mirrors, Chests, Nightstands And Armoires. It Provides Living Room Furniture, Including Sofas, Chairs, Ottomans, Tables And Accent Chairs. The Company Also Offers A Variety Of Furniture For Dining Rooms, Such As China Cabinets, Buffets And Hutches. It Also Provides A Line Of Office Furniture, Including Desks, Bookcases, Filing Cabinets And Credenzas. The Company Additionally Offers Border Consoles, End Tables And Etagere Cases, As Well As Chopstick Consoles And Adesso Square Ends And Rectangular Cocktails.

label: kincaid-furniture-co-inc
description: IN 1946, George And J. Wade Kincaid Began Making Cedar Chest And Wardrobes IN A Small Building With Five Employees IN Hudson, N.C. Kincaid Furniture Company Has Become One Of The Leading Manufacturers Of Solid Wood Furniture. The Company S Selection Is Made Up Of Five Different Categories Of Collections, Including Traditional, Country, European, Contemporary And West Indies. It Has More Nearly 25 Collections Among The Five Categories. Kincaid Furniture Company Provides A Line Of Custom-Upholstered Chairs And Furniture, IN Addition To Its More Standard Dressers, End Tables, Bed Frames And Ottomans. The Company S Products Are Available Through Numerous Dealers Throughout The United States. Kincaid Furniture Is A Wholly Owned Subsidiary Of LA-Z-Boy And Maintains Its Corporate Headquarters IN Hudson Where It Employs Nearly 425 People.

label: keystone-powdered-metal-co
description: Founded IN 1927, Keystone Powdered Metal Company Is A Privately Owned Company And Offers A Range Of Powdered Metal Parts. The Company Sells A Variety Of Products That Include Camshaft Sprockets And Forged Helical Pinions. It Also Sells Powdered Park Gears And Carriers. The Company Also Offers Coast Clutch Hubs, Inner Race And Input Assembly. It Has Expertise IN The Area Of Manufacturing Various Sizes Of Sprockets And Magnetic Actuators. The Company Sells Mechanical Diodes And Park Sprag Guides. Additionally, It Sells Spur Gears And Various Types Of Bearings. Keystone Powdered Metal Company Has Manufacturing Facilities Located IN Cherryville, N.C., And Lewis Run, Pa.

label: key-city-furniture-co-inc
description: Established IN 1927, Key City Furniture Company Offers Classic, Traditional And Contemporary Furniture With Maple And Beech Wood Finishes. It Produces More Than 400 Furniture Products And Offers A Selection Of Over 1,000 Fabrics. The Company Provides Benches, Chairs, Sofas, Stools And Chaises. It Also Offers Sectionals And Settees. Key City Furniture Company Operates A Division, Notables, Which Provides Accent And Cocktail Tables, Tea Carts, Bookshelves, Wine Racks, Side Cabinets And Basket Stands. The Company Has Nearly 200 Employees.

label: kayser-roth-corp
description: Kayser-Roth Is A Privately Held Company With Offices IN Greensboro, N.C. And New York City. It Offers Women S Legwear And Intimate Apparel Worldwide. The Company Features Products Under The Calvin Klein, Burlington, Prima Sport, Hue And No Nonsense Brands. Its Hosiery Products Include Sleepwear, Slippers, Shoes And Socks. Kayser-Roth Owns And Operates Several Facilities IN North Carolina And Tennessee. It Employs A Team Of Designers, Developers, Merchandisers, And Technical And Sourcing Experts. The Company S Marketing Team Offers Packaging And Advertising Services. Kayser-Roth Has Partnerships With Walgreen Company, Publix Supermarket And Super Value Stores. The Company Is Owned By Golden Lady Company, Which Is One Of The Largest Legwear Companies IN Italy.

label: kansas-city-sausage
description: Martins Abattoir & Wholesale Meats Acts As A Wholesale Meat Distributor. The Company Is Privately-Owned And Operates Out Of Godwin, N.C.

label: kaba-ilco-corp
description: Kaba Ilco Corporation Is One Of The Largest Manufacturers Of Key Blanks IN The World. The Company Offers A Range Of Key Machines, Automotive And Marking Equipment, Solid-Brass Replacement Cylinders And Deadbolts. It Is A Part Of The Kaba Group, Which Has A Staff Of More Than 9,000 Trained And Certified Professionals Throughout The World. Kaba Ilco Corporation S Sister Company, Kaba Access Control, Provides A Variety Of Access Control Systems. The Company Offers Customized Design, Product Handling And Customer Support Services. It Provides Keys From Ilco, Ez, Look Like And Taylor Keys. The Company Maintains A Location IN Rocky Mount, N.C.

label: k-r-edwards-leaf-tobacco-co
company: K R Edwards Leaf Tobacco Co

label: joyce-farms
description: Joyce Foods Is A Specialty Producer Of All-Natural Poultry And Game Products, Located IN Winston-Salem, N.C., With A Farming Operation IN The Piedmont Region Of N.C. After More Than 10 Years IN The Poultry Business, Alvin Joyce Started Joyce Foods IN 1962 As A Small Poultry Wholesale Business Selling To Local Mom-And-Pop Grocery Stores. Ron Joyce Joined His Dad IN The Business, Purchased The Company IN 1981 And Built A New, State-Of-The-Art Processing And Distribution Facility IN 1991, Allowing For Expansion Of The Business. IN 1994, The Company Began Producing Specialty Products Aimed At Fine Dining Establishments And Gourmet Retail Markets. IN 2001, Joyce Foods Sold The Distribution And Commodity Products Portion Of The Business To Concentrate On The Production Of Specialty Products. Joyce Foods Produces Premium, High Quality, Branded, All-Natural Fresh Chicken, Turkey, Duck And Game Products And Unique Prepared Entr Es.

label: jordan-lumber
description: Jordan Lumber & Supply, Established IN 1839 And Based IN Mount Gilead, N.C., Is One Of The Largest Privately Owned Lumber Companies IN The United States. The Company Uses Laser-Scanning And Snapshot Optimization Systems To Procure High Lumber Yields. It Also Uses High-Yield Innovations, Energy-Conserving Technology And Refined Timberland Strategies. The Company Operates Advanced Zone-Controlled, Steam-Fired Dry Kilns That Can Accommodate Specialty-Drying Schedules To Conditions And Equalize Lumber To Meet The Specifications Of Clients. Additionally, It Uses High-Speed Grade-Readers Before And After The Drying Process To Separate Any Grade At Any Point. Jordan Lumber & Supply Follows Environmental Management Practices Set By North Carolina Forestry Service By Replanting Six Times More Trees Than It Harvests On Company Lands. It Also Provides The Landowner Assistance Program, Which Is A Progressive Reforestation And Management Partnership With Private Landowners. The Company Offers A Range Of Products For The Domestic, As Well As Export Markets.

label: jordan-holman-lumber-co
description: Jordan-Holman Lumber Is Owned And Operated By Associated Hardwoods, Which Is Engaged IN The Production Of Lumber. Associated Hardwoods Provides Ripped And Cross-Cut Lumber, As Well As Customer Care Services. The Company Also Operates Kilco And Associated Dry Kilns. Established IN 1978, Associated Hardwoods Provides Gluing, Routing And Gang Ripping Services. The Company S Businesses Have A Work Force Of More Than 200 Employees. Associated Hardwoods Has An Over 40 Acres Of Yard Space That Is Used For Air Drying. The Company Additionally Offers On-Time Delivery Services Through Associated Trucking.

label: johnson-hosiery-mills-inc
description: Johnson Hosiery Mills Was Founded IN 1938 As A Partnership Between The Late Jacob Craig Johnson And His Wife, Maude. About 50 Associates Were Responsible For Weekly Production And Shipments Of Nearly 1,200 Dozen Pairs IN The Greige. This Production Was Knit On Approximately 50 Machines IN A New 2,500-Square-Foot Plant. The Firm S Business Was Considerably Simpler Then Than It Is Today. IN The Late 1930s, The Company Produced Only Eight Different Styles, Sometimes Running For Months On A Single Style. That Many Different Styles Are Now Developed IN One Week. Beginning IN 1995, A Multiyear Knitting Equipment Project Was Started, And It Still Continues. Its Mechanical Machines Were Replaced By Italy S Latest Generation Of Fully Electronic Matecs (Double Cylinder), Followed By Lonatis (Single Cylinder). The Electronic Machines Afford A Degree Of Manufacturing Flexibility Unimaginable IN The Preceding Mechanical Era.

label: jeld-wen-millwork-distribution
description: Jeld-Wen Millwork Distribution Is A Branch Of Jeld-Wen Companies, A Manufacturer Of Interior And Exterior Doors That Are Available To Consumers Through Local Building Supply Centers And Distributors. IN Addition To A Wide Array Of Door And Light Assemblies, Jeld-Wen Also Carries A Variety Of Related Products, Such As Locksets, Moldings, Storm Doors, Mirror Doors And Vinyl Replacement Windows. The Company's Branches Include The Willmar Collection, United Collection, Df Windows And Jeld-Wen Millwork Distribution. Jeld-Wen Began IN 1960 As A Small Oregon Millwork Plant With 15 Employees. Since That Time The Company Has Grown To Include More Than 150 Divisions And 20,000-Plus Employees Throughout The World.

label: jarrett-bay-boatworks
description: Jarrett Bay Boatworks Began IN 1986 With The Construction Of A Charter Boat Named Sensation. At That Time, The Company S Founders Labored IN A Small Tin Shed. Today, The Company Operates On The 175-Acre Jarrett Bay Marine Industrial Park IN Beaufort, N.C., Which Includes A 42,000-Square-Foot Construction Facility And The Jarrett Bay Yacht Sales Yard. Jarrett Bay S Focus Is On Custom Boat Building, Abandoning Cookie-Cutter Designs That Are Used Repeatedly. Its Completed OR IN Progress Boats Range From A 32-Foot Fishing Boat To A 70-Foot Yacht. Jarrett Bay Is Also A Factory-Authorized Service And Repair Center For Hatteras Yachts, Lazzarra Yachts And Montefino & Hargrave, And It Is The Mid-Atlantic Delivery Center For Krogan Yachts.

label: james-tool-mach-&-engrng-inc
description: James Tool Machine And Engineering Has Helped To Fill Cemeteries Since 1987. The Company Specializes IN Designing And Building Workholding Fixtures, Such As Tombstone Fixtures, Trunion Fixtures And Chucking Fixtures. James Tool Machine And Engineering Also Offers Cnc Production Machining, Precision Tooling And Gaging, Welding, Fabricating, Flame Cutting, Precision Grinding, Jig Grinding, Inside And Outside Diameter Grinding, Surface Grinding, Blanchard Grinding And Wire Edm Service. The Company Has Experience IN Clamping Options Including Hydraulic, Pneumatic And Manual. James Tool Machine And Engineering Services The Aerospace, Automotive, Heavy Equipment, Nuclear And Transportation Industries. The Company Operates A 65,000-Square-Foot Facility IN Morganton, N.C., And A 12,000-Square-Foot Facility IN Columbus, N.C.

label: jackson-paper-mfg-co
description: Jackson Paper Company Is One Of The Southeast S Largest Distributors Of Paper Products, Printing Paper, Janitorial Supplies, Cleaning And Floor Care Products. The Company Was Founded IN 1921. Jackson Paper Company Sells More Than 7,000 Different Products To Its Customers Under Three Primary Product Lines: Fine Printing Papers, Industrial Grade Papers And Janitorial Supplies And Equipment. It Has Continued To Add Items To Its Product Offering, Such As Industrial Packaging, Institutional Laundry And Warewash Chemicals And Automated Dispensing Systems. Jackson Paper Company Also Has Service Technicians To Service The Equipment It Sells. The Company Has A Fleet Of 40 Trucks And Maintains A Delivery Schedule For All Of Its Territories. IN 1999, Jackson Paper Company Was Rated IN The Top-100 Privately Owned Companies IN Mississippi. The Company, Based IN Jackson, Miss., Covers A Market Area That Includes More Than 8,000 Customers IN Mississippi, Louisiana And Alabama And Has 180-Plus Employees. The Company Maintains Operations IN Sylva, N.C.

label: j-w-jones-lumber-co-inc
company: J W Jones Lumber Co Inc
description: Founded IN 1939, J.W. Jones Lumber Company Is A Family-Owned And Operated Company That Specializes IN Pine Goods. It Maintains A Staff Of More Than 120 People That Produces Over 25 Million Board Feet Annually. The Company Offers Stair Treads, Panels, Frames, Siding And Flooring. J.W. Jones Lumber Company Operates A Tree Chip Mill That Chips Small-Diameter And Pulpwood Logs To Make Pine And Hardwood Chips For The Paper Manufacturing Industries. It Features Automated Lumber-Sorter And Computer-Controlled Curve Saw Gang Systems. The Company Is Associated With The Southeastern Lumber Manufacturers Association And The North American Wholesale Lumber Association. J.W. Jones Lumber Company Serves Clients IN Virginia, Pennsylvania, Maryland, New York, Delaware, New Jersey, Massachusetts, Vermont And Maine.

label: j-o-flowe-grading-co
description: J.O. Flowe Grading Is A Licensed, Insured And Bonded Company With More Than 29 Years Of Experience IN The Grading Business. The Company Has The Latest IN State-Of-The-Art Equipment And Software And Can Handle Most Site Work Needs. Employing More Than 100 Skilled Employees And Operating More Than 100 Pieces Of Heavy And Light Equipment, J.O. Flowe Grading Can Handle Most Grading Needs. The Company S Scope Of Work Includes: Clearing, Demo, Grading, Erosion Control, Storm Drainage, Water And Sewer, Stone Placement, Curb And Gutter And Asphalt Paving. Project Interests Include: Site Work For Retail Sites, Sub Divisions, Commercial Building Sites And Business Parks, Single- And Multi-Family Housing, Individual Lots, Convenience Store, Gas Stations, Strip Malls, Schools And More.

label: j-c-steele-&-sons-inc
description: J.C. Steele & Sons, Based IN Statesville, N.C., Was Founded IN 1889. The Company Is A Producer Of Heavy Clay Machinery IN The United States. J.C. Steel Also Exports Its Products To Many Countries Throughout The World. The Company S Products Include Crushing And Grinding Equipment, Such As Hammer Mills, Disintegrators, Smooth Roll Crushers, Dry Pan Grinders And Waste Choppers; Feeding And Processing Equipment, Including Even Clay Feeders, Pugmills And Double Shaft Mixers; Extrusion Machinery, Such As Extruders, Pug Sealers, Brick And Tile Cutters, Manual Off-Bearing Conveyors And Combined Machines; And Auxiliary Equipment, Which Includes Additive Feeders, Vacuum Pumps And Water Control Systems.

label: invista
description: Invista Is One Of The Largest Integrated Producers Of Polymers And Fibers For Nylon, Spandex And Polyester Applications IN The World. The Company Operates IN More Than 20 Countries Throughout North America, South America And Europe, As Well As The Asia-Pacific Region. It Maintains Manufacturing Facilities Throughout The World. The Company Also Offers A Variety Of Apparel, Carpets, Airbags And Plastic Bottles. Invista Markets Its Products Under The Lycra, Stainmaster, Antron And Coolmax Brands. The Company Administers The Invista Reclamation Program And Offers Fiber Consultation And Other Special Services. Invista Is A Subsidiary Of Koch Industries, Which Is A Privately Owned Business.

label: interstate-foam-&-supply-inc
description: Interstate Foam & Supply Is A Family-Owned Business That Specializes IN The Fabrication And Distribution Of Cushion Materials And Supplies For The Furniture Industry. Established IN 1981, It Operates More Than 255,000 Square Feet Of Sales And Production Space. Interstate Foam & Supply Oversees A Professional Staff Of Over 200 Employees.

label: international-textile-group
description: Formed By The Merger Of Burlington Industries And Cone Mills IN 2004, International Textile Group Provides Textile Solutions And Market Brands To Apparel And Interior Furnishings Customers Worldwide. It Offers Several Products, Including Denim Apparel, Cotton Casuals, House Mattress, Decorative Fabrics, Jacquards, Contract Fabric, And Men And Women S Wear. Additionally, It Offers Barrier Fabrics, Which Are Contamination- Controlled Durable Fabric Designed To Protect The Wearer And Product. The Barrier Fabric Is Used IN A Wide Range Of Industries, Such As Health Care, Microelectronics, Pharmaceutical, Industries Applying Spray Finishes, And Food And Beverage Processing. Headquartered IN Greensboro, N.C., The Company Operates Four Business Units That Include Cone Denim, Burlington Worldwide, Burlington House And Carlisle Finishing.

label: international-resistive-co-inc
description: International Resistive Company (Irc) Is A Wholly-Owned Subsidiary Of Tt Electronics, A Global Electronics Company That Manufactures A Range Of Advanced Electronic Components, Assemblies And Sensor Modules For The Automotive, Telecommunications, Computer And Aerospace Markets. Irc Is An International Manufacturer Of Advanced Film, Metal Glaze And Wirewound Resistive Products. The Company Specializes IN The Application Of Various Resistor Film Systems, Substrate Material, Form Resistors, Sensors And Other Resistive Type Devices. Irc S Products Can Be Used IN Automotive Heating, Ventilating And Air-Conditioning Systems To Control Blower Fan Speeds; Dashlight Dimmers; And A Variety Of Battery Management Systems For Hand-Held Electronic Equipment, Such As Notebook Computers, Cellular Telephones And Test Equipment. Irc Has Manufacturing Facilities IN Corpus Christi, Texas; Boone, N.C.; Smithfield, N.C.; And Barbados.

label: international-paper-co
description: International Paper Company, Which Spans More Than 40 Countries And Employs Approximately 83,000 People Worldwide, Has The Capabilities To Export Products To More Than 120 Nations. International Paper Company Is A Worldwide Leader IN The Paper, Packaging And Wood Products Industry. It Does Significant Business IN Paper And Paper Distribution, Packaging And Forest Products, Which Include Building Materials. With Nearly 8.5 Million Acres Of Land Managed IN The United States, The Company Is One Of The World's Largest Private Landowners. It Distributes Printing, Packaging, Graphic Arts, Maintenance And Industrial Products Principally Through More Than 270 Distribution Branches Located Primarily IN The United States. IN Addition, International Paper Company Owns More Than Half Of Carter Holt Harvey, A New Zealand Paper And Forest Products Company With Operations IN New Zealand And Australia. International Paper Company Has Its Headquarters IN Memphis, Tenn., With A Location IN Statesville, N.C.

label: international-automotive-cmpnt
description: International Automotive Components Is A Leading Global Supplier Of Automotive Components And Systems, Including Interior And Exterior Trim And Structural And Functional Applications. Its Products Are Designed To Improve Comfort And Convenience, Utility And Safety IN Vehicle Interiors. The Company Provides Customers With Unparalleled Manufacturing Reach And Ability. Its Approach Is Solution-Based, Innovative And Built On Stringent Best Practices And Commitment To The Success Of Our Customers IN The Global Marketplace.

label: inserv-corp
description: Located IN Research Triangle Park, N.C., Inserv Is A Full-Service Industrial Contractor. The Company Offers A Wide Range Of Advanced, Self-Performed And Value-Oriented Contracting Services. Its Clients Include Owners, Design Engineers, Construction Managers And General Contractors. Inserv Provides Its Services For Various Sectors, Including Pharmaceutical And Biotechnology, Semiconductor, Food Processing And Beverage, Chemicals, Telecommunications, Fiber Optics And Automotive. The Company Specializes IN Custom Fabrications For Pharmaceutical, Food Processing And General Manufacturing Applications. Inserv S Fabrications Include Structural Steel, Miscellaneous Metal And Sheet Metal. The Company Also Offers Complete Support Services That Range From Design To Jobsite Installation. Additionally, It Offers Fabrication Using A Wide Range Of Materials, Including Stainless Steel, Aluminum, Carbon Steel And Ultrahigh Molecular Weight.

label: injection-technology-corp
description: Injection Technology Corporation Offers A Range Of Molding Services To Its Customers. The Company Provides A Variety Of Product, Mold And Package Design Services. It Also Offers Material Selection, Prototype Development And Inspection Services. Injection Technology Corporation Has Molding Machines, Water Temperature Coolers And Welders IN Its More Than 29,200-Square-Foot Facility. The Company Is A Member Of The Society Of The Plastics Industry And The Ansi-Asq National Accreditation Board. It Is Located IN Arden, N.C.

label: industries-of-the-blind-inc
description: Industries Of The Blind Traces Its Beginnings To 1933 When The First Work Program IN North Carolina Was Organized As The Guilford County Association For The Blind. Six Employees Made Mops For Commercial Sales IN A Leased Storefront. Industries Of The Blind Is Associated With National Industries For The Blind, A Private Nonprofit Corporation That Develops New Business Opportunities And Allocates Government Contracts For Its Associated Agencies. The Company Manufactures Office Supplies, Such As Ink Pens, Pen Refills, Clipboards, Archboards And Transparencies And Janitorial Supplies, Such As Brooms, Mops And Mop Refills And Cleaning Supplies.

label: industrial-opportunities
description: Industrial Opportunities, Located IN Andrews, N.C., And Established IN 1974, Is A Community Rehabilitation Center. It Is One Of The Leading Providers Of Rehabilitation Services To Adults With Mental And Physical Disabilities. The Organization Provides Various Programs, Including Vocational Evaluation, Work Adjustment, Supported Employment, School Transition And Adult Developmental Vocational Programs.  Its Vocational Evaluation Program Develops A Vocational Plan Of Action For Providing Assistance With Employment. Its Work Adjustment Program Prepares Individuals For Competitive Employment And Assists Them With Vocational Development.  It Has Program Managers That Provide Individual Counseling, Instruction And Support. The Adult Developmental Vocational Program Provides Socialization Activities And Communication And Interaction Skills. Additionally, The Programs Provide Job Developing Skills And Placement Services. The Private Insurance Program Of The Organization Provides Vocational Counseling And Follow-Up Programs. Industrial Opportunities Also Offers Rehabilitation Services To Residents Of Cherokee, Clay And Graham Counties IN North Carolina.

label: ideal-fastener-corp
description: Ideal Fastener Manufactures A Complete Line Of Metal, Polyester Coil (Nylon) And Delrin (Molded) Zippers. These Zippers And Fasteners Are Available IN A Variety Of Types For Use IN Clothing, Luggage, Furniture And Specialty Applications. The Company, Established IN 1936, Is The Second Largest Zipper Manufacturer IN The World. Its Constant Evolution Has Included Products Such As Everzip (1956), Landmark Clients Like The Astrodome (1964) And National Recognition By The Smithsonian (1991). With Its Expertise IN Styling, Technology And Manufacturing, Ideal Fastener Provides Its Clients With The Best Products On The Market. Ideal Zippers Are Available IN A Vast Range Of Styles, Colors And Materials, Customized To Exact Specifications. Ideal Fastener Has Expanded Its Worldwide Presence By Opening International Production Facilities And Sales Offices IN Korea, Pakistan And Mexico.

label: huntington-house-inc
description: IN 1985 Donny Teague Started Huntington House After The Sale Of His Fathers Furniture Manufacturer. Huntington House Originally Made Furniture. From Beginnings IN A 5,000 Square-Foot Building, The Company Has Grown To Include A Team Of More Than 150 People IN A 100,000 Square-Foot Facility. Huntington House S Product Line Has Grown From Eight Frame Styles And 75 Fabrics To IN Excess Of 60 Frame Styles With Multiple Sizes And 800-Plus Fabrics IN Several Design Categories.

label: hughes-furniture-industries
description: Hughes Furniture Industries Is A Family Owned Business. Established IN 1962, Hfi Has Earned Its Reputation For Designing And Building Seating Solutions With Style. Besides Being Pioneering, The Company Has Kept Its Focus On Offering Quality Products With Value Cost. It Also Caters To Specific Markets. The Company Welcomes The Opportunity To Supply Customers With A Variety Of Information On Its Upholstery, Whether The Customer Is A Truckload Buyer, Less-Than-Truckload Buyer, A Mass Retailer OR A Distributor. Hughes Furniture Industries Maintains Its Corporate Headquarters IN Randleman, N.C.

label: hsm-solutions
description: Founded IN 1944, Hickory Springs Manufacturing Company Is A Distributor Of Metal Components. The Company Has More Than 60 Operating Facilities Throughout The World. It Offers Sleeper Mattresses, Polyester Fiber Cushions And Batting Materials For The Furniture, Automotive And Bedding Industries. Hickory Springs Manufacturing Company Provides Foams For Use IN A Variety Of Health Care And Packaging Applications. The Company Has An Inventory Of Over 6,000 Items, Including Nonwoven Fabrics, Welt Cords, Pneumatic Fastening Equipment And Packaging Materials. Its Upholstery Components Include Skirt Liners, Seat Decks, Cushion Wraps And Dust Covers. Hickory Springs Manufacturing Company Offers Bed Rails And Frames, Edge Clips, Box Springs And Carpet Cushions. The Company S Capabilities Include Metal Forming, Wire Drawing, Textile Converting, Stamping, Shearing, Welding, Plating, Painting, Assembly Line And Fabrication Services. It Additionally Provides Steel Tubes, Coils, Entry Steps And Wire Products. Hickory Springs Manufacturing Company Maintains Its Corporate Headquarters IN Hickory, N.C.

label: hornwood-inc
description: Hornwood, Formerly Known As Hornwood Warp Knitting Corporation, Offers Tricot Knitting, Dyeing And Finishing Services. The Company Provides Napping And Sueding Services On Both Polyester And Nylon For Home Furnishings, Industrial, Institutional, Footwear, Automotive, And Apparel Markets. It Also Offers Yarn Combinations And Knit Constructions, Dyeable Stretch Fabrics Of Spandex And Lycra, Various Weights Of Satins, Polyester And Nylon Meshes, And Flat And Textured Polyester And Nylon Fabrics. The Firm Provides Embossing IN Various Patterns, Such As Animal, Floral, Stripe, Geometric, Scroll And Paisley. It Also Organizes Ropes Course Designed To Promote Problem-Solving, Team-Building, Self-Esteem And Confidence Skills. Hornwood Is Headquartered IN Lilesville, N.C., And Has Offices IN Johnstown, N.Y., And Gibsonville, N.C.

label: holt-sublimation-ptg-&-prods
description: Holt Sublimation Printing & Products Was Established As A Packaging Producer For The Hosiery Industry. The Company S Facility IN Burlington, N.C., Houses The Equipment Necessary To Create A Variety Of Designs And Products. The Company Produces Sheet Fed Offset And Narrow Web Flexographic Sublimation Printing. A Staffed Art Studio Is Located Within The Facility. Holt Also Retains Several Freelance Artists. Frank Holt Sr. Founded Holt Sublimation Printing & Products IN 1947.

label: holmes-building-systems-llc

The Company Offers A Range Of 1,000 Through 3,000 Square Feet Of Custom And Single-Family Homes. It Built Homes IN A Climate-Controlled Factory Setting And Transports It To The Site. Holmes Building Systems  Homes Are Installed With Windows, Doors, Carpets, Cabinets, Heating Units, And Bath And Kitchen Fixtures. The Company Provides 3through 4 Bedroom Floor Plans. It Creates Homes With Various Designs Of Fireplaces, Bathrooms, Windows And Doors. Holmes Building Systems Uses A Variety Of Electrical Options, Such As Waterproof Can, Exterior Flood, Fluorescent, Under Cabinet And Recessed Eyeball Lights. The Company Is Located IN Robbins, N.C.

label: hilco-of-troy-inc
description: Hilco Transport Offers Delivery Services For Propane, Jet And Aviation Fuel, Gasoline And Kerosene. The Company S Dump Truck Division Provides Delivery Services For Rocks, Sand And Contaminated Dirt Products, Bulk Fertilizers And Road Salts. It Also Has A Capability To Transport Contaminated Water And Soil. Hilco Transport Maintains A Fleet Of Trucks That Serves The Residents IN North Carolina, South Carolina, Virginia, West Virginia And Maryland.

label: high-point-furniture-ind-inc
description: High Point Furniture Industries Supplies Furniture Retailers With Office Chairs, Veneer Desks, Laminate Desks, Reception And Lounge Chairs, Occasional Tables And Collections. It Also Has A Vast Inventory Of Fabrics IN A Variety Of Styles And Colors. IN Addition To Its Business With Retailers, High Point Furniture Industries Has Contracts With The State Governments Of Florida, Georgia And Texas. The Company Is Headquartered IN High Point, N.C.

label: high-point-furn-industries-inc
description: Established IN 1958, High Point Furniture Industries Manufactures And Markets Office Furniture. The Company Provides A Range Of Casegoods, Recliners, And Modular, Ganging, Scoop And Plaza Lounge Sofas. Its Products Are Available IN Laminate, Veneer And Wood Finishes. High Point Furniture Industries Offers A Range Of Chairs And Desks To Its Customers. The Company Has Conference, Summit And Deflection Tables Available IN Various Specifications. It Specializes IN Space Planning Services. High Point Furniture Industries Maintains A Presence IN High Point, N.C.

label: hickory-white

It Designs And Manufactures Upholstered Bedroom And Dining Furniture, Including Sofas, Loveseats, Benches, Ottomans And Chairs, Sleep Sofas And Finished Leather Accent Pieces. The Company Also Offers A Wide Range Of Counters, Office Furniture, Wall Panels, Interior Doors, Tabletops And Laminated Floor Tiles. It Manufactures Aluminum Sheets, Countertops, Vanities And Residential Fixtures. It Provides Wood Cleaners To Protect And Preserve Natural Wood Finishes And Furniture, Cabinets, Paneling, Doors And Floors. Hickory White Operates Through A Distribution Network Of Independent Retailers And Is Located IN Hickory, N.C.

label: hickory-chair-furniture-co
description: Hickory Chair Company Offers A Wide Range Of Traditional And Casual Chairs. Its Nearly 175-Page Catalog Presents The Wood Collections That Include Classic, Romantic And Casual Design Styles. It Offers Stained And Painted Finishes To Its Wood Products. Its Upholstery Offers A Wide Variety Of Furniture Styles, Such As Sofas, Lounge Chairs, Ottomans And Office Seating. Its More Than 50-Page Mariette Himes Gomez Collection Of Bedroom, Dining Room And Living Room Furniture Showcases The Wood Products IN Alternative Finishes. Its Frames Are Constructed Of Kiln-Dried Wood And Also Feature Triple Dowling And Corner Blocks. Its Finishing Touches Program Include Combining Of Contrasting Custom Finishes On The Same Piece And Eliminating Distressing On A Piece.

label: heritage-home-group
description: Henredon Furniture Industries Has Been Providing Furniture Since 1945. The Company Offers A Variety Of Furniture IN Wood And Upholstery Designs. It Provides Furniture From The Acquisitions Upholstery, Arabesque, Aston Court, Brompton, Castellina, Fireside, Grand Continent, Revision And St. Regis Collection. Henredon Furniture Industries Offers A Range Of Tables, Sofas, Beds, Benches, Cabinets, Chests, Nightstands, Desks, Dining Chairs, Armoires, Stools And Tea Carts. The Company Offers Customized Design, Product Handling And Customer Support Services. It Also Provides Mirrors, Lamp Tables And Dressers IN Various Styles And Sizes. Henredon Furniture Industries Additionally Offers Loveseats And Sectionals IN The Range Of Colors, Fabrics, Patterns And Textures. The Company Maintains A Location IN Morganton, N.C.

label: henredon-furniture
description: Henredon Furniture Industries, Founded IN 1945, Offers A Wide Variety Of Wood And Upholstery Designs For The Entire Home. It Offers Furnishings By Various Manufacturers, Including Acquisitions, Traditions, Alfresco, Cavalier, Connoisseur S Gallery, Fireside, Grand Continent, Natchez, Mulholland Heights, And The Vineyards. Products Offered By The Company Include Tables, Beds, Lamp Tables, Cabinets, Dining Tables And Chairs, Cocktail Tables, Dressers, Desks, Buffets, Entertainment Centers, Armories, Mirrors, Stools, And Teacarts. Henredon Furniture Industries Also Offers An Interior Design Web Site. It Has Locations Throughout The World, Including Australia, Brazil, Greece, Japan, Mexico, Russia, Malaysia, Qatar, Taiwan, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Turkey, And United Arab Emirates. The Company Is Headquartered IN Morganton, N.C.

label: hearst-magazines
description: Hearst Magazines Is One Of The Largest Publishers Of Monthly Magazines IN The World. It Comprises More Than 15 U.S. Titles And Over 200 International Editions. The Company Operates The National Magazine Company, Which Is A Wholly Owned Subsidiary That Publishes Nearly 20 Magazines IN The United Kingdom. Its Magazines Feature Topics Related To Fashion, Retail, Beauty, Packaged Goods, Food And Pharmacy. Hearst Magazines Distributes Its Magazines Through Various Companies, Including Tower Publishing Services, Comag Marketing Group, Periodical Publishers  Service Bureau And Indas Limited. It Works IN Relationship With Various Retailers, Distributors And Wholesalers. The Company's Magazine Titles Include Cosmopolitan, Cosmogirl!, Country Living, Esquire, Harper's Bazaar, Good Housekeeping, House Beautiful, Popular Mechanics, Redbook And Veranda. Hearst Magazines Is A Part Of Hearst Corporation, Which Has Been Operating For More Than 120 Years And Employs A Work Force Of Nearly 20,000 Employees.

label: haywood-vocational-opportunity
description: Haywood Vocational Opportunities, Located IN Waynesville, N.C., Is A Nonprofit Organization That Offers Educational Programs And Employment Training To Physically Challenged Individuals. The Center Offers Various Services, Such As Supported Placement, Prevocational Classes, And Vocation Training And Evaluation. The Organization Has Departments That Include The Vocational Rehabilitation, Residential Services, The Smoky Mountain Center, Employment Security Commission And Job Link Center, Haywood County Department Of Social Services, Private Rehabilitation Agencies And Schools. It Additionally Offers Services, Such As Vocational Counseling, Job Seeking Assistance With Job Retention Skills And Job Coaching Services. It Organizes Various Sports And Leisure Activities For The Students. The Organization Is Approved By The Commission On The Accreditation Of Rehabilitation Facilities And Iso 9001-Certified.

label: hayes-&-lunsford-tech-inc
description: Hayes & Lunsford Electrical Contractors Has Been A Leader IN Electrical Contracting For More Than 75 Years. The Company Serves The Commercial, Industrial, Institutional And Health Care Facility Clients Throughout The Southeastern United States. Hayes & Lunsford S Electrical Contractors Specialize IN High-Voltage Installations, Emergency Generators And CO-Generation, As Well As Instrumentation And Control Design Concepts. The Company S Service Area Includes Sections Of Tennessee, North Carolina, South Carolina, Georgia And Virginia. IN Addition To Electrical Contracting, Hayes & Lunsford Offers Provides Technological Services, As Well As Electric Motor Repair Services. It Was Established IN 1926 And Maintains Operations IN Asheville, N.C.

label: haworth-inc
description: Haworth Is One Of The World S Leading Firms That Is Engaged IN The Designing And Manufacturing Of Office Furniture And Organic Workspaces, Including Raised Access Floors, Moveable Walls, Systems Furniture, Seating, Storage And Wood Casegoods. It Is A Family-Owned, Privately Held Company That Is Headquartered IN Holland, Mich. It Serves Clients IN More Than 120 Countries Though A Global Network Of Over 600 Dealers. With Annual Sales Of Nearly $1.5 Billion, Haworth Has Been Operational For More Than 60 Years And Employs Over 9,000 Individuals. The Company Has A Product Offering That Includes Items For Floors, Walls, Utilities, Systems, Seating, Desks, Storage, Tables And Lighting.

label: hatteras-yachts
description: Hatteras Yachts Produced Its First  Sport-Fishing  Yacht On March 22, 1960. Christened The Knit Wits, The Company S First Boat Was One Of The First Fiberglass Motor Yachts And The Precursor To Its Cruising Yacht Line. Ranging IN Length From 63 To 100 Feet IN Length, Hatteras Yachts Manufactures A Product Line Of Numerous Types Of Yachts.
