label: cdb-corp
description: Founded IN 1989, Cdb Corporation Supplies A Range Of Medical Products And Equipment. It Offers A Variety Of Aesthetic Orthodontic Brackets And Ceramic Parts. The Corporation Provides A Range Of Product Design And Kit Assembling, As Well As Research And Development Services. Cdb Corporation Also Offers Nano Coating Solutions That Helps To Prevent Stains And Kills Bacteria. The Corporation Serves The Orthodontic And Dental Industry. It Has Received An Iso 13485 Certification From The International Organization For Standardization.

label: ccl-label-inc
description: Ccl Label Is One Of The Leading Converters Of Pressure Sensitive And Film Materials IN The World. The Company Serves The Healthcare And Consumer Packaging And Durable Segments Industries. It Supplies A Range Of Packaging And Label Solutions. The Company Offers Braile, Paper, Dual-Printed, IN-Mould And Wash Off Labels For The Personal Care And Food And Beverage Markets. Ccl Label Also Offers Shrink Sleeves Packaging Services. The Company Uses Customer Relationship Management Systems And File Transfer Protocol Services. It Operates Business-To-Business Programs. Ccl Label Is A Part Of Ccl Industries, Which Is One Of The Leading Providers Of Packaging Solutions IN The World. The Organization Is Headquartered IN Canada.

label: caterpillar-inc
description: Founded IN 1925, Caterpillar Is One Of The World's Largest Makers Of Construction And Mining Equipment, Diesel And Natural Gas Engines And Industrial Gas Turbines. It Offers Machinery, Motor Graders, Wheel Excavators, Scrapers, Buckets And Pulverizers. The Company Also Provides Maintenance And Support Services, As Well As Equipment On A Rental Basis. Caterpillar Offers Products For Airports, Hospitals And Sewer Systems. Caterpillar Provides Products Under The Mak, Perkins, Fg Wilson, Progress Rail And Cat Brands. It Has Manufacturing Facilities IN More Than 40 U.S. States And Over 20 Countries Worldwide. The Company Has A Staff Of Nearly 2,000 Individuals. Caterpillar S Subsidiaries Include Caterpillar Financial Services And Caterpillar Remanufacturing Services. It Operates Caterpillar Partstore, Which Stocks More Than 800,000 Parts.

label: case-farms-morganton-div
description: Case Farms Is A Poultry Farming And Processing Company That Consists Of More Than 2,000 Staff Members And Over 350 Contract Growers. The Company Maintains Several Hatcheries, Feed Mills, Processing Plants And Breeding Facilities. Founded IN 1986, Case Farms Processes Nearly 1.5 Million Birds And Produces More Than 500 Million Pounds Of Fresh, Partially Cooked And Frozen Poultry Products Per Week. It Provides Boneless And Skinless Chicken Breasts, Thighs And Legs, As Well As Tenders And Drumsticks To Retail Outlets. Case Farms Also Offers Several Ready-To-Cook Breaded Items, Such As Chicken Strips, Tenders, And Party And Boneless Wings. Additionally, The Company Exports A Variety Of Poultry Products To Clients Worldwide. The Company S Quality Assurance Department Has An Internal Hazard Analysis And Critical Control Point (Haccp) Program And Conducts More Than 4,000 Internal Quality Checks Per Week.

label: case-farms-goldsboro-div
description: Case Farms Is A Fully Integrated Poultry Farming And Processing Company. The Company Processes More Than 1.5 Million Birds Per Week, Has Over 2,000 Employees And Produces IN Excess Of 500 Million Pounds Of Fresh, Partially Cooked And Frozen-For-Export Poultry Products. Its Retail Products Include Boneless Skinless Breasts, Drumsticks, Boneless Skinless Leg Meat, Tenders, Boneless Skinless Thighs And Thin-Sliced Boneless Skinless Breasts. The Company Also Features Ready-To-Cook Breaded Items, Such As Boneless Breast Filets, Boneless Wings, Party Wings, Popcorn And Diced Meat, Strips And Tenders. Case Farms Is A Privately Held Company That Is Located IN Dudley, N.C.

label: cascade-tissue-rockingham
description: Cascades Tissue Group Is A Manufacturer And Supplier Of Tissue Paper For The Retail, Commercial, Institutional And Jumbo Roll Markets. It Produces Branded And Private-Label Tissues, Paper Towels, Paper Napkins And Other Related Products. It Owns Various Brand Names, Including Cascades, Doucelle And Capri. The Company Sells Commercial And Industrial Products Under Brand Names, Such As New Horizon, North River, Decor And Perkins. It Is A Unit Of Cascades, Which Produces, Transforms And Markets Packaging Products, Tissue Paper And Fine Papers, Composed Mainly Of Recycled Fibers. Cascades Employs More Than 15,000 Employees IN Over 140 Production Units Located Throughout North America, Europe And Asia. Cascades Tissue Group Is Located IN Rockingham, N.C.

label: cary-public-works-&-utilities
description: Cary Public Works And Utilities Department, Cary, N.C., Has A Wide Range Of Responsibilities, Including Water And Wastewater Treatment, Solid Waste Collection, Conservation Programs, And Maintenance Of Town Streets, Parks, Buildings And Vehicles. The Customer Service Staff Normally Handles Calls On Weekdays From 8 A.M. Until 5 P.M. During Severe Weather Such As Ice Storms OR Hurricanes, Crews Are On Duty Around-The-Clock. A Telephone Number Is Provided To Residents For Sewer Backups, Water Leaks, Grease Spills, Pothole Repair, Dead Animal Collection, Water Meter Installation And Other Requests For Service. Other Services Include Curbside Collection Of Garbage, Recyclable Materials, Yard Waste And Leaves.

label: carteret-county-news-times
description: News-Times Is An Online Edition That Serves Individuals IN Carteret County IN North Carolina. It Provides Information On World Affairs, Sports Activities, And Local And National News. The Newspaper Also Prints Editorials And Business Information. News-Times Offers Online Subscription Options, As Well As Prints Special Columns And Obituaries. It Publishes Features On Family- And Food-Related Topics. IN Addition, The Newspaper Prints Classified Advertisements On Real Estate And Employment. News-Times Provides Information On Weather Forecast And Publishes Public Notices. It Is A Part Of Carolinacoastonline, Which Also Operates Tideland News And Topsail Voice Journals.

label: carter-traveler-co
description: Carter Traveler Company, Located IN Gastonia, N.C., Is A Subsidiary Of A.B. Carter, And Supplies Spinning Accessories And Other Products Utilized IN The Yarn Manufacturing And Fabric Forming Sectors Of The Textile Industry. The Company Offers Various Products, Including Steel Spinning And Twisting Rings, Tapes And Belts, Plastic Bobbins, Air Splicers, Knotters, Textile Laboratory Equipment And Lubricants. It Is A Supplier Of Spindle-Drive Tapes, Flat-Drive Belts, Light-Weight Conveyor Belts, And Pulling And Lifting Straps For Various Textile Machine Applications, Such As Carding, Drawing, Spinning And Winding. It Also Offers Vertical Steel And Sintered Metal Rings For A Variety To Spinning Frame And Yarn Production Applications. It Also Supplies A Full Line Of Plastic Roving And Spinning Bobbins With Various Surface Finishes For Providing Resistance Against Rough Handling And Improving Winding Efficiency.

label: carson's-inc
description: Operational For More Than 60 Years, Carson's Hospitality Specializes IN The Manufacture Of Upholstery, Wood And Metal Furnishings. The Company Serves The Hospitality Market. It Develops Custom Furnishings For Guest Rooms And Public Areas. Carson's Hospitality Owns Metal Fabrication And Plating Operations. The Company S Products Include Ottoman, Sofas, Lounge Chairs, Sleepers And Occasional Tables.

label: carson-dellosa-pub-group
description: Founded IN 1976, Carson-Dellosa Publishing Provides Books, Classroom Essentials, Classroom Management Materials, Decorative Materials, Hands-On Learning Products And A Complete Line Of Educational Tools And Materials That Are Used To Educate And Motivate Students And Decorate Classrooms Throughout The World. The Company Specializes IN Activity Books And Supplements, Resource Books, Arts And Crafts Books And Materials, Teacher Resources, Early Learning And Primary Books And A Wide Assortment Of Learning Tools And Materials. Carson-Dellosa Also Designs And Manufactures A Complete Line Of Classroom Decorations, Supplemental Books And Other Resources Built On Sound Educational Principles That Aid Teachers, Parents And Students From Preschool Through The Eighth Grade. The Company Has Developed A Complete Line Of K-8 Curriculum And Intervention Solutions That Focus On Math And Language Arts Instruction. Carson-Dellosa Publishing Is Headquartered IN Greensboro, N.C.

label: carolon-co
description: The Carolon Company Has Been Involved IN The Design, Manufacture And Sale Of Anti-Embolism Stockings, Medical Vascular Hosiery, Hot And Cold Therapy And Compression Products For More Than 20 Years. Additional Products Include Bandages, Hot Mitts, Safety Slippers And Cushioned Foot Socks. Using Computerized Machinery And Durable, Lightweight Power Yarns, The Company Creates Fabrics That Are Easy To Get On And Have The Compression Levels Physicians Want. Carolon Company Is Located IN Rural Hall, N.C.

label: carolina-strapping
description: Carolina Strapping And Buckles Company Is A Wholly Owned Subsidiary Of Burlan Corporation. The Company Has Expertise IN The Areas Of Design And Manufacturing Engineered Technical Fabrics. It Has A More Than 75,000-Square-Foot Manufacturing Facility And Offers Heavy-Duty Orange Polyester Strapping For Various Industries. The Company Also Offers The Gatorstrap Brand Of Phosphate-Coated Wire Buckles And Woven Polyester Strapping. Additionally, The Company Sells Various Types Of Accessories, Including Strapping Dispensers And Tensioners. It Has A Team Of Trained Technicians That Specializes IN Design And Production. Carolina Strapping And Buckles Company Maintains An Office Location IN Gastonia, N.C.

label: carolina-precast-concrete-inc
description: Bob Hill And Len Worden Started Carolina Precast Concrete IN 1983 After Realizing The Need For A High Performance, Precast Concrete Products Facility IN The Carolinas. It Has Grown To Become One Of The Largest Precast Concrete Suppliers IN North Carolina. The Company Designs And Fabricates Custom Molds, Special Fittings And Accessories, As Well As Produces An Array Of Drainage Structures, Water And Sewer Structures And Telephone And Electrical Products. It Was One Of The First Precasters To Introduce Precast Catch Basins, Box Culverts, Endwalls And Drop Structures To North Carolina. Carolina Precast Concrete Has A 35,000-Square-Foot Plant On 58 Acres IN Dunn, N.C.

label: carolina-narrow-fabric
description: Established IN 1929, Carolina Narrow Fabric Specializes IN Manufacturing Custom-Designed Specialty Textiles For A Variety Of Applications. The Iso-Certified Firm Also Supplies Tapes And Fabrics To A Broad Range Of Markets, Such As Electrical, Medical, Automotive, Aerospace, Marine, Industrial, Military And Liquid/Gas Transport. The Company Produces Webbings From Polyester, Nylon, Kevlar, Vectran, Fiberglass And Carbon Fiber. Its Woven Fiberglass Tapes Find Applications IN The Electrical Equipment Market. Carolina Narrow Fabric Has Developed A Proprietary Process To Dye Fiberglass Yarns.

label: carolina-container-co
description: Maintained A 5,000-Square-Foot Design Services Area IN Laurinburg, N.C., Scotland Container Has Been Entrusted By Some Of The Southeastern United States  Largest Manufacturers To Assist Them With Their Corrugated Needs. Its Corrugated And Specialty Packaging Capabilities Encompass Brow Box, Point-Of-Purchase Displays And Graphics Packaging. With A Proven Success Of More Than 15 Years, The Company Operates A Network Of Facilities To Service Customers Nationwide. Scotland Container Employs Packaging Professionals That Offer Complete Structural And Graphic Solutions. The Company S Laurinburg Facility Houses Four Structural Designers And Two Graphic Designers. IN Addition, Scotland Maintains A Structural Design Lab IN Raleigh, N.C.

label: carolina-container-co
description: Carolina Container Is A Corrugated Packaging Company Located IN Hickory, N.C. Established IN 1928, The Company Offers A Diverse Product Line Ranging From Simple One Color Folding Cartons To More Complicated High Resolution Graphic Point-Of-Purchase Displays. It Also Die Cuts An Array Of Products, Including Self-Locking Bottom Cartons And Trapezoid Display Bases. Carolina Container S Contract Packaging Services Include Shrink Wrapping, Skin Packaging, Blister Packaging, Poly Bagging, Sonic Sealing, Assembly And Fulfillment And Foam-IN-Place. Its Two Facilities IN Hickory And High Point, N.C., Utilize The Lcad Design Systems To Develop Custom Graphic Designs For Its Customers.

label: carolina-container
description: Carolina Container Company Is A Shipping Container Production Facility That Helps Customer IN Corrugated, Shipping And Other Industries. It Offers A Diverse Product Line, Ranging From Simple One Color Folding Cartons To More Complicated, High-Resolution, Graphic Point-Of-Purchase Displays. It Can Also Die Cut An Array Of Products, Including Self-Locking Bottom Cartons And Trapezoid Display Bases. The Company Strives To Produce High Quality, Custom Designed Containers And Corrugated Product, Made To Exacting Measurements, When The Customer Needs Them. Carolina Container Ships Its Corrugated Products Throughout North Carolina And South Carolina, As Well As Eastern Tennessee And Southern Virginia. Established IN 1928, Carolina Container Company Has Headquarters IN High Point, N.C.

label: carolina-classics-catfish-inc
description: Carolina Classics Catfish Custom Harvests Catfish Ponds IN The Carolinas And Georgia. Its Catfish Is Shipped Alive To An 11,000-Square-Foot Processing Plant, Where It Is Turned Into Fillets, Nuggets And Other Forms For Shipment Along The East Coast And Abroad. Carolina Classics Contracts With More Than 40 Growers That Grow Fingerlings For Longer Than One Year OR Until Fish Are Market Size. The Company Is Located On A 270-Acre Farm, Which Raises Both Food Fish And Fingerlings. Since 1998, Carolina Classics Has Handled More Than 7.5 Million Pounds Of Catfish. Rob Mayo Founded Carolina Classics Catfish IN 1985.

label: carolina-carports-inc
description: Founded IN 1997, Carolina Carports Designs And Manufactures A Variety Of Metal Products And Structures That Includes Carports, Garages, Barns And Utility Buildings. The Company Provides Garage And Walk-IN Doors And Windows. It Offers Products And Services To The Residential And Commercial Sectors And Sells Through A Network Of Representatives. The Company Also Offers Installation And Delivery Services. Its Utility Buildings Are Available IN Regular, Boxed Eve And Vertical Roof Styles And Feature Storage And Open Parking Areas. The Company Offers Seneca Barns That Can Be Used As Feed Rooms And Horse Stalls. Headquartered IN Dobson, N.C., Carolina Carports Operates Various Manufacturing And Sales Divisions IN Texas, Georgia, Missouri, Mississippi, Pennsylvania And California.

label: carolina-cabinet
description: Carolina Cabinet Company Was Founded IN 1975 As A Custom Kitchen Cabinet Shop IN Black Creek, N.C. After Several Successful And Profitable Years IN That Area, The Core Business Focus Was Shifted To Incorporate Store Fixture Manufacturing, At Which Time The Company S Name Was Changed To Carolina Cabinet Company. The Company Produces Custom-Built Retail Fixtures, Displays And Showcases, Hospitality Furniture, Modular Furniture, Institutional Casework And Kitchen Cabinets.

label: carolina-business-furniture
description: Operational For More Than 60 Years, Carolina Business Furniture Designs And Manufactures Contract Seating Solutions For Customers Throughout The World. It Offers Products For Lounge, Guest And Health Care Settings. The Company Provides Tables And Chairs IN A Range Of Transitional And Contemporary Styles. Carolina Business Furniture Offers A Variety Of Recliners And Sleepers. The Company Provides Tailor Drawer Pulls, Tops, Bases And Door Fronts. It Also Offers Installation And Assembling Solutions. Carolina Business Furniture S Products Are Certified By The Greenguard Environmental Institute. The Company Is A Division Of Ofs Brands, Which Is A Family-Owned Corporation That Offers Furniture And Logistics Solutions.

label: carolina-building-solutions
description: Carolina Building Solutions Serves The Building Needs Of Customers And Provides A Variety Of Homebuilding Systems. It Specializes IN Cost Estimation, Construction, Inspection And Installation Services. The Company Also Offers Plan And Design And Engineering Services. Carolina Building Solutions Undertakes Contracts For The Construction Of Ranches, Multifamily Homes And Two-Storey Buildings. IN Addition, The Company Features An Online Picture Gallery Of Its Projects. Carolina Building Solutions Is Located IN Salisbury, N.C.

label: carolina-beverage-group-llc
description: Carolina Beer & Beverage Company, Established IN 1997, Is One Of The Leading Regional Breweries IN The Southeast. The Firm Utilizes More Than 10 Fermenters Of 100-Barrel Capacities. Its Package Line Is Capable Of Undertaking More Than 5,000 Cases Per Shift. The Firm Has The Capacity Of Producing More Than 100,000 Barrels Annually, Including Ready To Drink Beverages. Its Flash Pasteurizer Allows Longer Bottle Shelf Life And Allows Kegs To Be Stored At Room Temperature. The Firm Operates A More Than 30,000-Square-Foot Plant And Over 14,000 Square Feet Of Additional Warehouse Space. It Also Offers Branded Merchandise, Such As Polo Shirts, Hats, Jackets, T-Shirts And Beach Towels. Carolina Beer & Beverage Company Is Located IN Mooresville, N.C.

label: carolina-absorbent-cotton
description: Carolina Absorbent Cotton Is A Division Of Barnhardt Manufacturing Company, Which Is One Of The Leading Suppliers Of Cotton, Rayon And Polyester Coils IN The United States. Barnhardt Manufacturing Company Serves The Pharmaceutical, Vitamin, Generic And Nutraceutical Industries. Carolina Absorbent Cotton Has Been Providing Fiber Filling And Packaging Services For More Than 70 Years. It Offers Medical Balls, Light-Weight Coils And Carded Products IN Various Sizes. The Company S Products Are Used For Tablet Packaging And Ensure Freshness IN Shipping And Storing Of Food Supplements. With One Of Its Locations IN Charlotte, N.C., Carolina Absorbent Cotton Also Serves Customers IN Connecticut And Nevada.

label: c-r-laine-furniture-co-inc
company: C R Laine Furniture Co Inc
description: Located IN The Foothills Of The Appalachian Mountains Of North Carolina, C.R. Laine Furniture Company Began Modestly IN 1958, Producing Goose Neck Rockers With Three Part-Time Employees And Its Owner C.E. Roseman, Sr. Since That Time, The Company Has Grown Into A Full-Service Upholstered Furniture Manufacturer Producing The Best IN Classic Eight-Way Hand Tied Products. Laine S Mission Is To Provide Customers With Upholstered Furniture Of The Greatest Possible Value. The Company Believes Value Is Comprised Of Four Areas - Fashion, Comfort, Service And Affordability. It Offers A Wide Variety Of Styles And Fabrics Making It Possible For Customers To Create Their Own Unique Piece Of Furniture. Its Manufacturing Facilities And Corporate Offices Are Located Near Interstate 40 IN Hickory, N.C.

label: butler-manufacturing-co
description: Butler Manufacturing Company IN Laurinburg, N.C., Is The Southeast Regional Manufacturing Location For Butler Manufacturing Company. Bmc Is A Building Solutions Company That Provides The Design, Manufacture And Marketing Of Metal Building Systems For Commercial Construction. Its Systems Play A Part IN Buildings Within The Commercial, Community, Industrial And Agricultural Markets. With Subsidiaries, Such As Butler Construction And Butler Real Estate, The Company Goes Beyond The Manufacture Of Steel Building Systems By Offering Full-Service Turnkey Construction Solutions. It Is A Bluescope Steep Limited Company, One Of The Leading Steel Companies IN Australia And New Zealand, Supplying A Large Percentage Of All Flat Steel Products Sold IN These Markets.

label: burnett-william-t-&-co-inc
description: Wm. T. Burnett & Co. Offers A Diverse And Unique Range Of Technical Foam And Fiber Products For The Automotive, Bedding, Filtration, Furniture And Industrial Markets. Formed IN 1898, First As A Mattress Manufacturer, Later As A Producer Of Cotton Batting, The Company Then Expanded Its Capabilities To Produce Specialty Synthetic Fiber Products. IN 1954, Burnett Was The First American Company To Produce Open-Celled Flexible Polyurethane Foams, And Later Invented The Industry Standard For Pouring Wide-Width Continuous Foams. The Company Is Comprised Of Two Divisions, Technical Foams And Nonwoven Fibers, And A Wholly-Owned Subsidiary, Consumer Products (Stx). Burnett S Corporate Office Is Located IN Baltimore. Its Foam Division Is IN Jessup, Md., And The Fiber Division Is IN Statesville, N.C.

label: burlington-ind-performance
description: Founded IN 1923, Burlington Worldwide Is One Of The World S Leading, Full-Service Apparel Solution Organizations That Serves Clothing Manufacturers And Retailers. The Company Specializes IN Worsted Wool, Cotton And Performance Textiles. It Has Manufacturing Facilities IN The United States, Mexico, Central America, China, Australia, Canada, Europe And Vietnam. Burlington Worldwide Supports Several Global Issues, Such As Economic Development, Environmental Sustainability, Labor Relations And Human Rights. Burlington Worldwide Is A Part Of International Textile Group, Which Is A Global, Diversified Textile Manufacturer That Has Annual Sales Of More Than $1billion. International Textile Group Was Founded IN 2004 And Also Operates Burlington Solutions, Burlington Labs, Burlington Collections And Burlington Uniforms.

label: buckeye-fire-equipment-co
description: Buckeye Fire Equipment Is A Full-Line Manufacturer Of U.L. Listed Portable And Wheeled Fire Extinguishers, Dry Chemical Powders, Foam Concentrates And Foam Hardware. The Company S 165,000-Square-Foot Manufacturing Facility Is Located IN Kings Mountain, N.C. Buckeye Fire Equipment Has Sales And Distribution Centers IN Los Angeles, Chicago, Dallas, Houston, Miami And New Jersey. The Company Manufactures Our Steel And Aluminum Components For Its Fire Extinguisher Line. Products Include Steel Fire Extinguishers Cylinders, Cylinder Bottoms, Handles, Levers, Hose Bands, Wall Hooks And Vehicle Brackets. Buckeye S Automatic Screw Machines And Drilling Centers Produce All Valves, Siphon Tubes, Nozzles, Couplings, Valve Stems, Cylinder Collars And Other Parts. Buckeye Fire Equipment Manufactures A Complete Line Of Environmentally-Safe Fire Fighting Foams And Foam Hardware.

label: buckeye-anodizing-&-stamping
description: Established IN 1984, Buckeye Anodizing & Stamping Company Specializes IN A Variety Of Finishes For Aluminum Products. It Has Achieved An Iso 9001-2000 Certification From The International Organization For Standardization. The Company Offers Sulfuric Acid, Hardcoat And Decorative Anodize, As Well As Chromate Conversion, Ball Bat Graphics And Silk Screening Services. It Serves Clients IN The Automotive, Aerospace, Medical And Telecommunication Sectors. Buckeye Anodizing & Stamping Company Features A Range Of IN-House Equipment, Such As Amperage Rectifiers With Automated Digital Controls. Additionally, It Has Expertise IN Rack Design And Building Processes. The Company Includes A Chemical Laboratory And Computer-Maintained Tank Records.

label: bsn-medical-inc
description: Bsn-Jobst Creates Stockings That Provide Compression Therapy For The Care And Management Of Venous And Lymphatic Diseases, Including Varicose Veins, Deep Vein Thrombosis, Chronic Venous Insufficiency, Venous Ulcers, Peripheral Edemas And Lymphedema. The Jobst Brandis Recognized And Requested By Health Care Professionals And Patients Worldwide. Jobst Stockings Originated With Founder Conrad Jobst IN 1950. Beiersdorf Ag, Of Hamburg, Germany, Acquired Jobst IN August 1990. The Acquisition Included The Jobst Headquarters And Manufacturing Sites IN Toledo, Ohio, Plus Manufacturing Operations IN Hildebran, N.C., And Thurles, Ireland. Beiersdorf Ag Also Acquired Varitex IN Germany. Varitex Was Renamed Jobst IN 1996. IN April 2001, The Business Was Renamed Bsn-Jobst As It Became An Affiliate Company Of Bsnmedical. Bsnmedical Is A Joint Venture Holding Company Equally Owned By Smith & Nephew And Beiersdorf.

label: broyhill-furniture-industries
description: Thomas H. Broyhill, Founder Of Broyhill Furniture Industries, Made His Initial Investment IN Furniture Manufacturing IN 1905 IN Lenoir, N.C. IN 1919, T.H. Broyhill Became The Majority Owner Of Lenoir Furniture Corporation, Manufacturing Bedroom And Dining Room Furniture. Interco Inc., A Diversified Holding Company With A Stable Of Consumer Goods Manufacturers, Acquired Broyhill IN 1980. The Company Is Part Of Furniture Brands International, The Parent Company Several Furniture Manufacturers, Such As Lane, Thomasville, Henredon, Drexel Heritage And Maitland-Smith. Broyhill's Product Line Includes Both Residential And Contract Divisions, Manufacturing Bedroom, Dining Room, Occasional Tables, Wall Systems Home Entertainment, Home Office And Numerous Upholstered Furniture Categories. Broyhill Furniture Industries Employs More Than 7,200 People Companywide And Maintains A Location IN Rutherfordton, N.C.

label: brooks-equipment-co-inc
description: Brooks Equipment Company, Founded IN 1941 And Based IN Charlotte, N.C., Is A Wholesale Distributor Of Fire Equipment And Related Parts. The Company Has 18 Locations Across The United States And Offers An Inventory Of More Than 6,100 Items To Clients. It Offers A Range Of Products, Such As Fire Extinguishers And Chemicals, Cabinets, Accessories And Covers, Fire Hoses, Nozzles, Brass And Fire Department Connections And Emergency Response Products. It Also Offers Sprinkler Accessories And Standpipe Equipment, Smoke And Carbon Monoxide Detectors, Safety Products, First-Aid Products, Exit And Emergency Lighting And Service Equipment. Additionally, It Provides Fire Extinguisher Parts And Pictograms, Restaurant System Parts, Signs, Labels And Tags.

label: brinley's-grading-svc-rsdntl
description: Brinley S Grading Services Offers Complete Residential Grading, Landscaping And Complete Commercial Site Development, Including Utilities Installation, Ands Is Located IN Garner, N.C. Its Residential Services Include Clearing, Building House Pads And Backfill Foundations, Fine Grade Lots, Hauling Dirt, Stone And Sand And Landscaping Services. Its Commercial Division Offers Various Services, Such As Asphalt Paving And Stripping, Concrete Slabs, Grading And Land Clearing. It Is A Member Of The Home Builders Association, North Carolina Association Of General Contractors And Professional Construction Estimators Association. Brinley S Grading Services Has Variety Of Equipments Backhoe, Loader, Excavator, Dozer, Compactor And Scraper.

label: bridgestone-aircraft-tire-usa
description: Bridgestone Aircraft Tire (Usa) Offers A Range Of Products And Services For The Aviation Industry. The Company Provides A Variety Of Aircraft Tires, As Well As Retreading Services. It Has Been Serving Clients For More Than 70 Years. The Company Also Maintains Aviation Facilities IN Tokyo, Belgium And Hong Kong. Bridgestone Aircraft Tire (Usa) Is A Part Of Bridgestone Corporation, Which Is One Of The Leading Tire And Rubber Companies IN The World. Headquartered IN Japan, It Operates Through Sales And Service Departments. IN Addition, Bridgestone Corporation Specializes IN Tires And Tubes For Passenger Cars, Trucks, Buses, Construction And Mining Vehicles, And Industrial And Agricultural Machineries.

label: braxton-culler-inc
description: Established IN 1975, Braxton Culler Inc. Provides A Range Of Interior Design Products And Services To Its Customers. Located IN Sophia, N.C., The Company Offers Product Line For Homes And Outdoors. It Provides Upholstery For Chairs, Sleeping Chairs, Sofas, Recliners And Sofa With Slip Cover. The Company Offers Bedroom Accessories, Such As Drawer Dresser, Mans Chest Top, Summer Retreat, Round Mirror And Dresser. The Firm Offers Over 1000 Fabric Choices And Wood Finishes. It Has Over 410,000-Square-Feet Of Manufacturing Space.

label: brass-craft-mfg-co
description: Founded IN 1964, Brasscraft Manufacturing Company Is A Manufacturer Of Water Supplies And Gas Plumbing Products For Wholesale And Retail Markets. Its Products Include Gas And Water Connectors, Faucet Repair Parts, Toilet Tank Fill Valves, Brass Compression, Pipe And Hose Fittings, Drain Cocks, Needle Valves, Pipe Nipples, And Bottled Gas And Garden Hose Fittings. The Company Also Provides A Variety Of Commercial Supplies That Include Heavy-Pattern Supply Stops, Risers, Fittings, Tubular Products And Accessories. It Also Offers A Range Of Product Finishes, Such As Almond, Biscuit, Oil-Rubbed Bronze, Polished And Satin Nickel And White. Brasscraft Manufacturing Company Is A Part Of Masco Corporation, Which Is One Of The World S Largest Manufacturers Of Various Consumer Products For Home Improvement And New Construction Markets. It Is Also Sells And Installs Insulation And Other Building Products, Such As Cabinets, Fireplaces, Gutters, Bath Accessories, Garage Doors, Shelves And Windows.

label: borg-warner-inc
description: Founded IN 1987, Borgwarner Is One Of The Leading Suppliers Of Engineered Automotive Systems And Components For Power Train Applications IN The World. The Company S Products Are Sold To Original Equipment Manufacturers Of Commercial Trucks, Buses And Agricultural And Off-Highway Vehicles. It Serves Customers IN North America, South America, Europe And Asia. Borgwarner Works With A Team Of More Than 14,000 Staff Members. It Maintains Over 60 IN Nearly 15 Countries. The Company Operates The Borgwarner Engine Group, Which Develops Strategies And Products To Manage Engines For Fuel Efficiency, Reduced Emissions And Enhanced Performance. Its Clients Include Ford, Toyota, General Motors, Daimler, Chrysler, Fiat, Bmw, Honda And John Deere.

label: boral-bricks-inc
description: Boral Bricks Is America S Largest Brick Manufacturer, Producing Approximately 1.5 Billion Bricks Each Year   Enough Brick To Circle The Earth Eight Times. Boral Offers More Than 150 Varieties Of Bricks And Pavers For Residential OR Commercial Applications, Including Smooth, Molded, Beveled, Stacked OR Ashlar Styles IN Burgundy, Red, Pink, Gray, White, Brown OR Beige. It Also Offers The Proprietary Brands Pastelcote, A Monolithic Product With The Texture And Durability Of Brick, And 17th Century Products That Give A More Antique Appearance. Boral Bricks Operates Approximately 20 Manufacturing Facilities IN Eight States Throughout The Southeast, Including One IN East Spencer, N.C. It Is Part Of The Boral Industries Family, Which Includes Boral Materials Technologies, US Tile And Boral Construction Materials. Headquartered IN Atlanta, The Boral Group Is Owned By Boral Limited, Australia S Major Building And Construction Materials Supplier.

label: blythe-development-co
description: Blythe Development Company Is A Privately Held Licensed General Contractor And Is Located IN Charlotte, N.C. The Company Was Founded IN 1989 And Specializes IN Site Work And Golf Course Construction. Its Operations Include Clearing, Grading, Storm Drainage, Sanitary Sewer, Waterline, Erosion Control And Irrigation. It Also Provides Services, Including Concrete Paving, Retaining Walls, Stone Base And Asphalt Paving, Seeding, And Bunker And Tee Construction. The Company Employs More Than 500 People And Has Constructed More Than Seven Golf Courses, Including The Charlotte Golf Links, Divide Golf Club, The Tradition, Waterford Golf Club And The Springfield Golf Club. It Has Also Assisted IN Construction Of The Birkdale Golf Club, Rocky River Golf Course And The Ballantyne Golf Resort. Additionally, The Blythe Development Company Offers Renovation Services.

label: blythe-construction
description: Blythe Construction's Asphalt Division Was Awarded The 2004 Quality IN Construction Award By The National Asphalt Pavement Association. Blythe Construction, A Subsidiary Of The Hubbard Group, Provides Specialized Construction Services For Customers, Including The City Of Charlotte And The Departments Of Transportation For North Carolina, South Carolina And Georgia. The Company Has Successfully Completed A Range Of Public And Private Contracts Throughout The Carolinas And IN Georgia Including Interstate Highway Expansions And Interchanges, Dams And Golf Course Construction. Its Recent Projects Include: The Raleigh Outerloop IN Wake County, N.C; The I-485 Charlotte Outerloop; The Guilford County Greensboro I-85 Bypass; The US 311 Highway IN Highpoint, N.C.; Independence Boulevard IN Charlotte, N.C.; I-85 IN Both Spartanburg, S.C., And Georgia's Gwinnett County; And I-385 IN Greenville, S.C. The Company Is Organized Into Three Construction Divisions And Three Paving Divisions Located IN Active Business And Construction Markets IN North Carolina And South Carolina.

label: blum
description: Blum Manufactures Hinges, Drawers And Roll Out Systems As Well As Assembly Devices For Cabinetry. The 400,000-Square-Foot Facility Houses A Shipping And Receiving Area, Hinge And Drawer Runner Manufacturing, Assembly Lines, Profile-Stamping Machines, Pretreatment And Powder-Coating Lines. There Is Also An 85-Foot-High Product Storage Building With An Advanced Automated Retrieval System With A Capacity For 12,000 Pallets And A 22,000-Square-Foot Shipping Warehouse Equipped With Automated Conveyor Equipment. The Facility Also Holds A Cabinet Shop, Samples Area And Administration Offices. Blum Is A North American Subsidiary Of Austrian-Based Julius Blum Gmbh. Established IN 1977, Blum S First Location Was A Warehouse IN Hickory, N.C. Two Years Later, Blum Usa Moved To A 15-Acre Site IN Stanley, N.C., Establishing An Assembly And Distribution Operation That Would Come To Be Known As Building Expansion 1.

label: blue-ridge-metal-corp
description: 'Cold Heading' Is A Process Of Rapidly Producing Enlarged Sections On A Piece Of Rod OR Wire IN A Die Resulting IN The Shape Of The Die Cavity. This Process Is Done Expertly At Blue Ridge Metals. The Company Was Established IN 1988 As A Cold Heading Wire Processor And Producer Of Precision Cold-Formed Slugs. The Company Has Evolved Into A Full Service Company That Produces Cold Heading Quality Wire, Cold-Formed Slugs And Finished Automotive Parts. Blue Ridge Metals Supplies The Hardware, Bearing And Automotive Industries. As Its Own Customer For Cold Heading Quality Wire, The Company Has A Depth Of Experience And Expertise Not Often Found IN Typical Wire Processing Shops OR Cold Forming Companies. This Knowledge Translates Directly Into A Strong Technical Advantage For Its Customers. Additionally, The Company Has An 80-Year History To Draw Upon From Its Parent Company, Central Yoshida Corporation, IN Nagoya, Japan. Blue Ridge Metals Is Located IN Fletcher, N.C.

label: betco-inc
description: Betco, Founded IN 1984, Offers Customers Self-Storage Products And A Variety Of Self-Storage Services. Its Manufactured Products Include Self-Storage Buildings And Self-Storage Door And Hallway Systems. New Building Design Choices Include Single-Story, Multi-Story And Bi-Level And Can Include Climate-Controlled Units. The Company Can Convert An Existing Structure Into Self-Storage Building. Betco Also Offers Building Design, Self-Storage Consultation, Shipping And Self-Storage Construction Crews. The Company Maintains Its Headquarters IN Statesville, N.C., And Has Additional Offices IN Bryan, Texas, And Marco Island, Fla.

label: berry-plastics
description: Polymer Group Is A Global, Technology-Driven Developer, Manufacturer And Marketer Of Engineered Materials. With Sales IN More Than 85 Countries Totaling $844 Million IN 2004, Pgi Is One Of The World S Leading Non-Woven Producers. The Company Operates IN Two Segments - Consumer Products And Industrial And Specialty Products   To Serve The World S Leading Product Manufacturers IN The Hygiene, Wipes, Medical And Industrial Markets. Polymer Group Employs Nearly 3,200 Individuals At More Than 20 Manufacturing Facilities And 20 Sales Offices IN 12 Countries. The Company Has 12 Manufacturing Centers IN The United States Alone, Including One IN Benson, N.C. Polymer Group Is Headquartered IN North Charleston, S.C.

label: berry-global
description: Aep Industries Manufactures, Markets And Distributes Plastic Packaging Solutions For The Food And Beverage, Industrial And Agricultural Markets. The Company Makes More Than 15,000 Types Of Multipurpose And Flexible Packaging Films. It Features Polyethylene, Stretch, Specialty And Customized Products. Aep S Research And Development Team Designs Film To Serve Numerous Applications, Such As Labeling, Candy Wrapping, Sealing, Converting, Printing And Insulation. The Company Produces Various Combinations Of Tensile Strength, Thickness, Shrinkability, Toughness, Surface Friction, Sealability, Permeability, Transparency And Clarity. It Creates A Wide Range Of Forms, Such As Sheeting, Tubing And Cut, Rolled And Perforated Bags. Aep Provides Can Liners, Food Bags And Pallet Wrap. The Company Operates Facilities IN The United States, Greece, France And Germany. It Supplies 800 Million-Plus Pounds Of Film Per Year. Aep Industries Maintains A Location IN Matthews, N.C.

label: bernhardt-furniture-co
description: Founded IN 1889, Bernhardt Furniture Company Designs, Manufactures And Markets A Full Line Of Residential And Office Casegoods And Upholstered Furniture. The Company S Products Include Beds, Armoires, Bedside Pieces, Chests And Dressers, Tables, Buffets, China Cabinets, Chairs, Occasional And Cocktail Tables, Etageres, Hall Chests, Entertainment Centers, Bars And Servers, Side And Console Tables, Desks, Benches And Settees, Mirrors, And Conference Tables And Chairs. Bernhardt Upholstered Furniture Is Available IN A Wide Variety Of Textiles And Several Grades Leather. IN Addition To Its Residential And Corporate Furniture Line, The Company Also Manufactures And Markets The Martha Stewart Signature Collection Of Home Furnishings. The Company Markets Its Products Though A Network Of Distributors And Retailers Throughout North America And More Than 35 Countries Worldwide. Bernhardt Furniture Company Is Headquartered IN Lenoir, N.C., And Has Operations IN Shelby, N.C.

label: bell-&-howell-llc
description: Operational For More Than 70 Years, B We Bell + Howell Develops A Range Of Equipment And Software Technologies And Serves Customers Throughout North America And Europe. It Offers A Range Of Processing And Postal Solutions, As Well As Mailing And Document Management Services. The Company's Products Include Mail Verification And Sorting Systems And Mail Distribution Products. It Serves Various Banking, Financial, Government, Health Care, Insurance, Manufacturing, Retail, Telecommunications And Utility Industries. B We Bell + Howell Provides Facility Management, Installation Support And Business Continuity Services. It Is A Member Of Various Associations, Including The Minnesota Mailers Association, National Postal Policy Council And Electronic Data Systems Foundation. The Company Additionally Offers Online Credit Application Options. B We Bell + Howell Maintains A Location IN Durham, N.C. It Is A Part Of B We Group, Which Provides Mailroom Solutions.

label: belding-hausman-inc
description: Belding Hausmann Incorporated, Formed As M. Hausman & Sons And Acquired By Belding Heminway Company, Is One Of The Leading Companies That Manufactures A Range Of Textile Products IN The United States. The Company Serves More Than 325 Customers IN The Textile Industry. It Is A Vertically Integrated Manufacturer Of Specialty Fabrics And Yarns. Belding Hausman Incorporated Provides Top-Of-The-Bed, Converting And Specialty Yarns For Home, Office And Commercial Furnishings, As Well As The Hospitality And Apparel Markets. The Company Also Offers Yarn Dying Services For Rayon, Polyester, Cotton, Acrylics And Filament Nylon. Belding Hausman Incorporated Maintains Fabric And Yarn Manufacturing Facilities IN North Carolina.

label: bassett-furniture-warehouse
description: Bassett Furniture Industries Is A Leading Manufacturer And Marketer Of Mid-Priced Home Furnishings. The Most Significant Growth Vehicle For Bassett Continues To Be The Company S Dedicated Retail Store Program. Bassett S Retail Strategy Encompasses Affordable Custom-Built Furniture That Is Ready For Delivery IN The Home Within 30 Days. Bassett Furniture Industries Is Based IN Bassett, Va., And Has An Additional Location IN Mt. Airy, N.C.

label: barnhill-contracting-co
description: Founded IN 1949, Barnhill Contracting Company Is One Of The Leading, Full-Service Construction Firms IN The United States. It Offers A Range Of Pre-Construction, Site Development And Commercial Building Services. The Company Serves Clients IN The Industrial, Manufacturing, Hospitality, Residential And Retail Sectors. Barnhill Contracting Company S Capabilities Include Design And Build, Project Management, Grading, Erosion Control, Storm Drainage, Wetland Mitigation And Asphalt Paving. The Company Operates A Highway Division That Provides Construction Services To The Departments Of Transportation IN North Carolina, South Carolina And Virginia. It Is Also One Of The Largest Producers Of Asphalt IN North Carolina And Has More Than 15 Asphalt Plants.

label: barnhill-contracting-co
description: Headquartered IN Tarboro, N.C., Barnhill Contracting Company Is A Full-Service Construction Company That Offers A Range Of Services, Including Preconstruction, Site Development And Building. Its Site Development And Highway Construction Divisions Provide Project Management, Grading, Erosion Control, Storm Drainage, Wetland Mitigation And Asphalt Paving Services. Additionally, The Company S Building Division Specializes IN Estimating, Scheduling, Constructability Analysis, Engineering And Fast Track Delivery Services. label: barcalounger-co

Located IN Chantilly, Va., It Operates A Manufacturing Plant IN North Carolina That Offers The Latest Generation Of Automated Quality Control And Accountability Systems. Banknote Corporation Of America Utilizes Varied Techniques, Such As Proprietary Anticopy Features, Latent Images And Microline Printing IN Its Designs To Customize The Client S Security Documents.

label: bally-refrigerated-boxes-inc
description: Bally Refrigerated Boxes Had Its Beginnings IN The Case And Cooler Business More Than 70 Years Ago IN Bally, Pa. Bally Refrigerated Boxes Has A State-Of-The-Art Manufacturing Facility IN Morehead City, N.C., And Retains A Sales Force IN Pennsylvania. Bally S Wall, Ceiling And Floor Panels Are Made Of Liquid Urethane Sandwiched Between Metal Skins And Are Locked Together On-Site. The Panels Are Light, Insulating And Come IN A Variety Of Widths, Heights, Thicknesses And Metal Types. Bally Panels Are Used Worldwide IN Restaurant And Institutional Kitchens, Environmental Testing Rooms, Refrigerated Warehouses And Floral Storage Units.

label: balcrank-corp
description: Balcrank Products Began IN 1906 As A Manufacturer Of Machine Handwheels And Cranks. label: ati-industrial-automation
description: Serving For More Than 20 Years, Ati Industrial Automation Inc. Is One Of The Leading Engineering-Based World Developers Of Robotic And Effectors, Which Includes Automatic Tool Changers, Multi-Axis Force/Torque Sensing Systems, Robotic Deburring Tools, Robotic Collision Sensors, Rotary Joints And Compliance Devices. Robotic Tool Changer Provides Flexibility To Automatically Change End-Effectors OR Other Peripheral Tooling. Its Tool Changer Models Cover A Wide Range Of Applications Including Small And Heavy Payloads Applications Requiring Large Moment Capacity. Ati Industrial Automation Inc. Also Supplies Six-Axis Force/Torque Sensors System. The System Consists Of A Transducer, Shielded High-Flex Cable And Intelligent Data Acquisition System, Ethernet/Devicenet Interface OR F/T Controller And Measures All Six Components Of Force And Torque. The Company Is Certified With Iso 9001 Certificate.

label: assa-abloy-entrance-systems
description: Established IN 1976, Besam Automated Entrance Systems Is A Wholly Owned Subsidiary Of Assa Abloy Group. Besam Automated Entrance Systems Has Its Manufacturing Facility Located IN Monroe, N.C.

label: arvin-meritor-inc
description: Arvinmeritor Is One Of The Leading Companies IN The World That Provides A Range Of Integrated Systems, Modules And Components To The Motor Vehicle Industry. The Company Offers Transmissions, Drive Axle Carriers, Steering Gears And Drivelines. It Provides Products Under The Brand Names Of Gabriel, Arvin And Purolator. Founded IN 1909, Arvinmeritor Designs And Manufactures Products For Use IN Commercial, Specialty And Light Vehicles And Serves Commercial Truck, Trailer And Original Equipment Manufacturers. The Company Offers Braking Systems And Controls, Clutches, Wheel Ends And Foundation Brakes For Trucks. It Maintains More Than 110 Locations IN Over 25 Countries. label: artistree
description: Artistree Is A Manufacturing Company That Produces A Variety Of Integrated Frames And Moldings. It Operates Manufacturing Facilities IN California, Texas And North Carolina. The Company Processes More Than 25 Million Linear Feet Of Frame Molding And Custom-Cut Mats For Michaels Stores And Aaron Brothers. Artistree Is A Part Of Michaels Stores, Which Is One Of The Leading Retailers Of Arts And Crafts Materials IN The United States. It Is A Chain Of Retail Stores That Provides Framing, Floral, Wall D Cor And Seasonal Merchandise Items For Residential And Commercial Applications. The Parent Company Has An Inventory Of Over 37,000 Items And Operates Nearly 1,000 Retail Stores IN Approximately 45 U.S. States.

label: armstrong
description: Founded IN 1860, Armstrong World Industries Designs And Manufactures A Range Of Floors, Ceilings And Cabinets. Headquartered IN Lancaster, Pa., The Company Operates More Than 40 Plants IN Over 10 Countries, Including Germany, Canada And China. It Serves The Residential And Commercial Markets. The Company Sells The Bruce And Robbins Brands Of Flooring Products. It Also Sells Laminates, Resilient Sheets And Tiles And Genuine Linoleum, Which Is A Specialty Carpet And Sports Flooring. The Company Offers Acoustical Ceilings, Suspension Systems, And Kitchen And Bath Cabinets. Additionally, It Sells Toughguard, Armalock And Swiftlock Brands Of Flooring And Laminates. Armstrong World Industries Employs Nearly 12,800 Staff Members Worldwide And Maintains A Location IN Statesville, N.C.

label: armacell
description: Armacell Enterprise Gmbh Is One Of The Leading Global Companies IN The Market For Flexible Technical Insulation Materials. Located IN Conover, N.C., The Company Specializes IN Manufacturing Thermal- And Acoustic-Elastomeric Insulation Materials. It Also Provides Various Insulation Products, Including Ultraviolet (Uv) Resistant, Halogen-Free Insulation And Flexible Cryogenic Systems For Industrial Process Pipework And Tanks. Additionally, The Company Provides Acoustic Products, Including Sheets And Rolls, Tubes, Barriers And Polyethylene Terephthalate (Pet) Cores. It Caters Enclosures, Flooring, Ceilings And Partitions, Wind Energy, Marine And Transport Markets.

label: areva-np
description: Areva Np Specializes IN The Design And Construction Of Nuclear Power Plants And Research Reactors. The Company Offers Instrumentation, Control, Modernization And Maintenance Services. It Operates Industrial And Commercial Offices Throughout The World. Areva Np Also Supplies Nuclear Fuel To More Than 100 Plants. The Company Manages Subsidiaries IN The United States And Germany. Its Energy Business Maintains Operations IN The Nuclear Service And Equipment Sectors. The Company Operates Areva Np Gmbh And Areva Np Incorporated. It Designs And Manufactures Steam Generators And Vessel Heads. The Company Offers Spare Parts, Such As Actuators, Filters, And Reactor Coolant Pump Seals And Coolant Pump Components. Areva Np Provides Swr 1000 And Antares.

label: arden-co
description: Arden Companies Is One Of America's Leading Manufacturers And Marketers Of Outdoor Products, Household Consumer Products And Professional Kitchen Textiles. Arden Was Founded IN 1964 IN Detroit. Its Mission Was To Provide Quality Products And Services To The Retail Community. The First Products Were Cleaning Pads And Laundry Bags, Made IN A Factory IN Ionia, Mich. Arden S Headquarters Are IN Southfield, Mich., And It Has Six Manufacturing Facilities IN North Carolina, Indiana, Texas And California With More Than 1,000 Employees And Factory Alliances IN Europe And Asia. The Company Is One Of The Nation S Largest Suppliers Of Outdoor Replacement Cushions And Umbrellas. Its Scouring Products And Textiles Are Sold By Virtually Every Major Retailer IN The United States And Used IN Homes And Restaurants Throughout North America.

label: ardagh-group
description: Rexam Beverage Can Americas Provides A Range Of Packing Solutions For Consumer Products. It Is Owned And Operated By Rexam, Which Is One Of The Largest Consumer Packaging Groups And Beverage Can Makers Worldwide. Rexam Serves The Beverage, Personal And Health Care And Food Markets. The Company Specializes IN Beverage And Plastic Packaging Products. It Manufactures Cases For Lipsticks And Mascara, Compacts, Closures For Fragrances And Dispensing Solutions For Perfumes, Lotions And Foams. Rexam Also Offers Plastic Containers And Closures, Drug Delivery And Medical Devices, Pharmaceutical Pumps And Valves, As Well As Ophthalmic Packaging Products For The Health Care Market. It Operates More Than 110 Manufacturing Facilities IN Over 20 Countries. The Company Employs More Than 22,000 People.

label: arch-buildings
description: U.S. Buildings Has Been A Factory-Direct Provider Of The Advanced Clear Span Protective Buildings IN The United States For More Than 25 Years. It Maintains A 50,000-Square-Foot Facility That Features A Fully Automated, Computer-Aided Manufacturing Line That Creates High-Quality Products. The Company Employs Various Architects And Engineers To Develop Its Arch System. U.S. Buildings Constructs Small Backyard Shops And Garages And Recreational, Agricultural, Commercial And Housing Structures. Its Buildings Are Improved For Ventilation And Airflow And Insulated IN Order To Reduce Heating Costs. The Company Also Provides Various Arches, Services Doors, End Walls, Ventilators And Sky Lights. U.S. Buildings Maintains Location IN Boone, N.C., And Deerfield Beach, Fla.

label: apparel-sales-&-printing-inc
description: Apparel Sales And Printing, Also Known As Asap, Offers Custom Screen Printing And Embroidery On A Variety Of Apparel And Accessories. Established IN 2006, It Provides More Than 400,000 Logo Products For Brief Bags, Planners, Mugs, Mouse Pads, Stadium Cups And Car Flags. Apparel Sales And Printing Also Provides On-Site Screen Printing Services At Special And Sporting Events, Open Houses, Grand Openings, Car Shows, And Outdoor And Indoor Concerts. It Offers A Range Of T-Shirts, Outerwear, Sport Shirts, Wovens, Headwear, Bags And Accessories. The Company Provides Products From Several Brands, Such As Arnald Palmer, Agusta, Willow Pointe, Old Navy, Gap, Sierra Pacific And Inner Harbor. Apparel Sales And Printing Is Located IN Wilmington, N.C.

label: aplix-inc
description: Established IN 1958, Aplix Deals IN Self-Gripping Fastening. Some Of Its Technologies Include Knitting, Converting, Weaving, Plastic Extrusion And Plastic Injection. The Company Serves A Wide Range Of Industries, Such As Hygiene, Automotive, Cleaning, Aircraft, Medical, Military And Packaging. It Is An Iso 9001/ Iso Ts 16 949 Certified Firm.

label: apex-tool-group-distribution
description: Generations Of Do-It-Yourselfers Have Relied On Tools Made By Danaher Tool Group For Some Of The Best-Known Retail Brands IN The World. Danaher Products Are Recognized By Professional Automotive Technicians Around The World For Their Accuracy, Durability And Ergonomic Design. Hand Tools Designed For Industrial Applications Offer Global Growth Opportunities Based On Value-Added Innovation. Integrated Electronic Displays Combine Convenience With Measurable Benefits IN Speed And Safety. Danaher Tool Group Is A Subsidiary Of Danaher Corporation, One Of The Leading United States Based Manufacturers With A Worldwide Workforce Of Approximately 37,000. With Leading Businesses IN Professional Instrumentation, Industrial Technologies, And Tools And Components, Danaher Makes Long-Term Investments IN Established And Internationally Active Industrial Enterprises. Its Business Activities Encompass Three Reporting Segments And Are Comprised Of Six Strategic Platforms: Professional Instrumentation, Industrial Technologies And Tools And Components. The Company Is Headquartered IN Washington D.C., With Locations Throughout The United States Including Gastonia, N.C.

label: apac-atlantic-inc
description: Thompson-Arthur Division Is One Of The Leading Companies That Offers Asphalt Paving Services IN North Carolina. The Company Provides Stone Base, Bridge, And Curb And Gutter Construction Services. It Offers Site Utilities, Grading And Sand Products. Thompson-Arthur Division Works On Various Highway, Private And Commercial Paving Projects. The Company Maintains More Than 15 Asphalt Facilities. It Is A Part Of Apac, Which Is One Of The Leading Companies IN The Transportation Industry. Apac Operates IN More Than 10 Southern And Midwestern States IN The United States. It Maintains Over 90 Aggregate Production Facilities, Including Nearly 20 Ready-Mix Concrete And More Than 220 Hot-Mix Asphalt Plants.

label: amesbury-sealing-products
description: The Amesbury Group, Previously Known As Amesbury Industries, Offers A Range Of Sliding And Swing Patio Door Hardware. The Group Is A Division Of Lupus Capital, Which Is Headquartered IN London. The Amesbury Group Offers Custom Thermoplastic Extrusions Specializing IN Multidurometer Profiles And Quick Turnaround Custom Solutions. Its Textile Division Provides Single And Dual Durometer Bulb Extrusions, Glidefit, And Several Other Variations Of Weather Seals. It Offers Weather Stripping Products Under The Foam-Tite Brand. The Group Also Operates Bsi-Balance Systems, Which Provides Block And Tackle Balances That Fit Into The Jamb Liners For Single- And Double-Hung Windows. The Amesbury Group Maintains A Location IN Statesville, N.C.

label: amesbury-hardware-products
description: Founded IN 1975, Bsi-Balance Systems Has Grown Into One Of The World S Leading Manufacturers Of Block And Tackle Sash Balances For Single- And Double-Hung Windows. The Company Is A Subsidiary Of Amesbury Group, Which Is A Division Of The Laird Group. Amesbury Acquired Bsi IN 1995. Bsi-Balance Systems Has Four Manufacturing Facilities IN Statesville, N.C.; Sioux Falls, S.D.; Reno, Nev.; And Toronto. label: american-technical-solutions

label: american-stainless-tubing-inc

label: american-roller-bearing

label: american-preformance-ind

Whitin Roberts Has The Ability To Turn, Mill, Drill, Cut Off, Bend, Punch, Heat Treat, Grind, Weld, Paint And Powder Coat Almost Any Type Of Metal.

label: american-media-intl-llc
description: American Multimedia International S Scope Of Services Range From Creative Inception To Final Distribution Of Any Cd, Cd-Rom, Floppy Diskette, Audio OR Videocassette. label: american-emergency-vehicles
description: American Emergency Vehicles Manufactures An Array Of High-Performance Emergency Vehicles For All Applications. The Company Has The Most Extensive Line-Up IN The Industry, Including Its Traumahawk Type I, Type Ii And Type Iii Ambulances Built On Ford E350 And E450 Chassis, IN Addition To Its Traumahawk Medium-Duty Vehicles Built On The Freightliner Fl60 Chassis. Aev Has Operated Since Its Inception As A Ford Motor Company Qualified Vehicle Modifier. Aev S Ambulances Are Sold By Independent Dealers IN All 50 States And Internationally IN Canada, Europe, Central America, South America, The Middle East And The Far East. Approximately 250 People Work IN The Company S Jefferson, N.C., Production Facility.

label: american-crane-corp
description: Terex Cranes Is A Full-Service Dealership Of Cranes That Provides All-Terrain, Rough Terrain, Lift And Carry And Telescopic Truck Cranes, As Well As Container Reach Stackers. The Dealership Also Offers A Range Of Pre-Owned Cranes. Terex Cranes Features A Parts Department That Sells Crane Parts And Accessories. The Dealership Also Features A Sales And Service Department. It Also Offers Financial Products And Services To Assist IN The Acquisition Of Terex Equipment Through Terex Financial Services.

label: american-axle-&-mfg-inc
description: Metaldyne Is A Leading Worldwide Designer And Supplier Of Metal-Based Components, Assemblies And Modules For Transportation-Related Power Train And Chassis Applications. The Applications It Serves Includes Engine, Transmission/Transfer Case, Wheel-End And Suspension, Axle And Driveline, And Noise And Vibration Control Products Found IN The Motor Vehicle Industry. Headquartered IN Plymouth, Mich., Metaldyne Has Annual Revenues Of Approximately $2 Billion. The Company Employs More Than 6,500 Employees At Nearly 40 Facilities IN 14 Countries. Metaldyne Has A Location IN Greenville, N.C.

label: american-&-efird-llc
description: American And Efird Is One Of The World S Foremost Manufacturers Of Sewing Threads. The Company Manufactures Sewing Thread For Industrial And Consumer Markets. IN Addition, A&E Distributes A Variety Of Notions And Trim Items. Its Consumer Product Division Manufactures And Markets Thread To Distributors For Use IN Home Sewing, Including Apparel Sewing, Crafts, Embroidery And Quilting. A&E Also Distributes Notions Such As Hook And Loop Tape, Polypropylene Webbing And Zippers As A Part Of Its Consumer Product Line. The Company S Notion Products Include Buttons, Elastics, Hangers, Jet Clips, Poly Bags, Pins, Tags And Labels. The Company Was Founded IN 1891 And Is Located IN Lenoir, N.C.

label: american-&-efird-llc
description: American & Efird Inc. Is One Of The Leading Manufacturers Of Sewing Threads And Industrial Yarns IN The World. For More Than 118 Years, The Company Has Been Providing Embroidery Threads And Technical Textiles. It Supplies Threads For Apparel And Specialty Industrial Applications And Technical Textiles For Electrical, Wire/Cable And Mechanical Rubber Goods Industries. Located IN Gastonia, N.C., The Company Manufactures Threads Also For The Use IN Home Sewing, Crafts And Quilting. American & Efird Inc. Is A Member Of The American Apparel & Footwear Association.

label: amano-pioneer-eclipse-corp
description: Pioneer Eclipse Remains The Only True Systems Company Operating IN The Ultra High-Speed Floorcare Industry. While Rapid Industry Consolidation Has Created Some Hybrid Competitors That Own Both Equipment And Chemical Manufacturing Companies, The Company Is The Only Organization That Manufactures All Aspects Of Chemical And Equipment Systems Under One Roof. Pioneer Eclipse S Mission Is To Satisfy Its Customer S Needs With The Highest Quality Products And Services While Being Recognized As The Industry Leader IN Quality, Innovation, Safety And Above All, Customer Satisfaction. With This IN Mind, The Goal At Pioneer Eclipse Has Never Changed. The Company Wants To Be Known As The World S Finest Manufacturer Of Ultra-High Speed Floor Care Systems.

label: alsco-metals-corp
description: Alsco Metals Corporation Is One Of The Largest Suppliers Of Residential, Aluminum Building Products IN North America. The Company Has Been IN Operation Since 1947 And Maintains Manufacturing Facilities IN Ohio, North Carolina And Wisconsin. It Serves Clients IN The Home Improvement And Remodeling Markets. The Company Offers A Variety Of Aluminum Trim Coils, Soffits And Accessories. Alsco Metals Corporation Also Provides Siding And Roof Moldings. Alsco Metals Corporation, A Wholly Owned Subsidiary Of Aleris International, Manufactures Rainware Products And Gutter Coils.

label: allscripts
description: The New Allscripts-Misys Healthcare Is The Clear Leader IN Software, Services, Information And Connectivity Solutions That Empower Physicians And Other Healthcare Providers To Deliver Best-IN-Class Patient Safety, Clinical Outcomes And Financial Results. Nationwide, More Than 150,000 Physicians, 700 Hospitals And Thousands Of Other Healthcare Providers IN Clinics, Post-Acute Care Facilities, And Homecare Agencies Utilize Allscripts Solutions To Automate And Connect Their Clinical And Business Operations.

label: allison-erwin-co-inc
description: Allison-Erwin Company Is A Wholesale Distributor Of Electronics, Furniture And Appliances. The Company Stocks A Full Line Of Hotpoint And General Electric Appliances, Including Washers And Dryers, Built-IN Products, Dishwashers, Electric And Gas Ranges, And Many Styles Of Refrigerators. It Also Offers Various Models Of Fedders Room Air Conditioners IN Different Sizes. The Firm Provides Different Models Of Philips Televisions, Tape Deck Shelf System, Rooster Alarm Clock Radios And Dvd Players. The Company Offers Furniture From Crownmark, Del Mar, Hillcraft And Ashley. It Provides A Wide Range Of Payment Methods To Its Customers. Allison-Erwin Company Accepts Mastercard And Visa Credit Cards, And Is Headquartered IN Charlotte, N.C.

label: allen-canning-co
description: Allen Canning Company Has Been IN The Vegetable Business Since 1926. Headquartered IN The Hills Of The Ozarks IN Siloam Springs, Ark., The Family-Owned And Operated Company Grows And Packs Vegetables Under 11 Respected Brand Names: The Allens, Butterfield, East Texas Fair, Popeye, Princella, Royal Prince, Sugary Sam, Sunshine, Trappey S, Veg All, And Wagon Master. The Company Recently Acquired Veg+all, The Number One Brand Of Canned Mixed Vegetables From Birds Eye Foods, And New Harvest Foods Of Pulaski, Wis.

label: alcatel-lucent
description: Lucent Technologies, Located IN Charlotte, N.C., Designs And Delivers The Systems, Services And Software Required For Communications Network. It Provides Services, Such As Mobility, Optical, Software, Data And Voice Networking Technologies. The Company Offers Solutions And Services To Industries, Including Small Enterprises, Government Offices And Cable Operators Worldwide. It Provides Services IN Various Fields; Such As Physical Sciences; Nanotechnology; Computer Sciences And Software; Mathematical Sciences; Advanced Wireless And Wireline Networking Research; And Network Security. The Company Additionally Offers Professional, Managed, Deployment And Maintenance Services To Its Clients. Its Other Services Include Identifying Network Performance, Security And Reliability, Outsourcing The Operations Of Multivendor Networks, And Integrating And Streamlining The Engineering Process.

label: alba-waldensian-inc
description: Headquartered IN Valdese, N.C., Alba-Waldensian Was Founded IN 1901 By Waldensians Who Had Emigrated From Italy IN The Late 1800s To Start New Lives IN The Foothills Of The Blue Ridge Mountains. From This Modest Beginning, The Company Has Grown Over The Years Into A Multi-Facility Company Manufacturing A Variety Of Very Innovative Products For Domestic As Well As International Markets. The Company Uses The Most Modern, State-Of-The-Art Computerized Knitting Technology, To Produce A Wide Variety Of Stretch Panties, Bras, Body Suits, Panty Hose And Medical Specialty Products. The Health Products Business Has Grown Steadily, And Today The Alba Health Products Division Is A Leading Manufacturer And Marketer Of Products Used IN Hospitals, Nursing Homes, Physicians  Offices And Extended Care Facilities Throughout The World.

label: alamance-foods
description: IN 1959, Alamance Foods  Parent Company, Alamance Foods/Triton Water, Was Selected As A Franchise Producer For A Revolutionary New Product, Aerosol Whipped Cream. Alamance Foods Was Then Established As A Separate Company For The Production Of The New Product And Began Producing The Reddi-Wip Brand Of Whip Cream. The Company Is One Of Three Major Producers Of Aerosol Whip Cream IN The United States. Alamance Foods/Triton Water Manufactures Private Label And Branded Water, Flavored Drinks, Freeze Pops And Aerosol Whipped Cream. The Line Of Alamance Foods/Triton Water Brands Consists Of Triton Water, Freeze Pops, Fun Pops, Happy Drinks, Big Drinks, Li'l Drinks And Classic Cream. Located IN Burlington, N.C., Alamance Foods Was Founded When R. W. Scott Began To Sell Butter And Cream, Churned Primarily For His Own Family's Consumption, More Than 100 Years Ago.

label: akzo-nobel-coatings-inc
description: Akzo Nobel Coatings Is A Subsidiary Of Akzo Nobel, A Global Fortune 500. Akzo Nobel, Based IN The Netherlands, Is A Multinational Organization That Serves Customers Throughout The World With Human And Animal Health Care Products, Coatings And Chemicals. An Employer Of More Than 61,000, It Is Divided IN 13 Business Units And Maintains Operating Subsidiaries IN More Than 80 Countries. As One Of The Biggest Paint Companies IN The World, Akzo Nobel Coatings Is Divided Into Five Areas Business: Decorative Coatings, Industrial Activities, Car Refinishes, Marine And Protective Coatings And Noblias Claims And Fleet Solutions. Akzo Nobel Coatings Brands Include Crown, International, Sikkens, Interpon And Sadolin. The Coatings Group Maintains Operational Bases IN More Than 55 Countries And Is An Employer Of More Than 30,000. Akzo Nobel Coatings Has An Operation IN High Point, N.C.

label: airclean-systems-inc
description: Founded IN 1992, Airclean Systems Is One Of The Largest Manufacturers Of Specialty Fume Hoods, Ductless Hoods, Workstations And Enclosures IN North America. Based IN Raleigh, N.C., The Company Offers A Variety Of Products, Such As Powdersafe, Fumeaway, Teachaide, Pcr Workstation, Robotic Enclosure, Portable Filter Box And Many More. The Company Operates From A 45,000 Square-Foot Manufacturing Facility With A Computer Numerical Control (Cnc) Machining Center And A Fully Equipped Electronic Design Department.

label: air-systems-componenets

The Air System Components Corporate Headquarters IN Richardson, Texas, Is Home For Multiple Marketing Brands That Operate As Independent Companies. The Titus And Krueger Brands Have Been Major Market Forces For More Than 50 Years And The Tuttle & Bailey Brands For More Than 100 Years. The Penn Ventilation And Barry Blower Brands Have Merged To Form Pennbarry For Marketing Products To The Commercial And Industrial Sectors. Products Are Found IN All Types Of Industrial Facilities, Commercial Buildings, Schools, Hospitals, Universities And Premier Residences Throughout The World And Even On The International Space Station.

label: aigis-mechtronics
description: Aigis Mechtronics Inc. Produces A Full Line Of Electro-Mechanical Equipment, Including Housings For Cameras, Integrated Camera/Housing Packages, Mini-Domes, Pan/Tilt Units And Mounts. Aigis Mechtronics Inc. Offers A Full Line Of Electro-Mechanical Equipment For The Closed-Circuit Television (Cctv) Security Market. The Company Also Offers A Variety Of Services To Meet Its Client S Specific Needs, Including Custom Design, Contract Manufacturing/Specialized Engineering And More.

label: agi-shorewood
description: Established IN 1967, Shorewood Packaging Is A Publicly Held Company That Provides Printing And Packaging Solutions For The Music And Pharmaceutical Industries. With Offices Throughout The United States And World, It Provides A Variety Of Packing Products, Such As Folding Cartons, Rigid Boxes, Foams And Displays. The Company Provides Products Under Various Brand Names, Including Bend & Peel, Metalfx, Repak And Shorepak. It Offers Design, Engineering, Converting, Digital Printing, Scanning, On-Site Packing, Distribution, And Inventory And Asset Management Services. The Company S Client Base Includes The Confectionery, Health Care, Cosmetic, Entertainment And Tobacco Industries. It Is A Division Of International Paper Company, Which Provides Several Paper And Packaging Solutions. Shorewood Packaging Maintains One Of Its Manufacturing Facilities IN Weaverville, N.C.

label: adele-knits

The Company S High Performance Fabrics Include Fabrics For Cheerleading And Baseball Uniforms, Cycling Pant Liners, Antimicrobial-Microsafe, Personal Flotation Device Fabrics And Footwear Insole And Inflatable Bladder Fabrics. Its Paint Shop Products Include Tube Wipers, Flat Wipers, Tack Cloth, Alcohol Towel Rolls And Hose And Robotic Covers. Its Apparel Products Include Leotards, Helanca Liners And Spandex Apparel. The Company S Industrial Products Include Automotive Fabrics, Rubber, Foam And Film Lamination, Medical Fabrics And A Host Of Fabrics With Custom Features. Adele Knits Controls Each Step Of Production IN Its 200,00 Square Foot Facility IN Winston Salem, N.C.

label: acme-sample

The Company S Capabilities Include Catalogs, Brochures, Direct Mail Pieces, Graphic Design And Layout, Web Site Design And Hosting, Prepress, Film Lamination, Bindery Services And Die Cutting. Asb Offers Complete Services From Concept To Design And Photography To Printing For Single Projects OR Entire Campaigns. Asb Graphics Is Located IN High Point, N.C.

label: accu-fab-inc
description: Accu-Fab Provides Contract Manufacturing Services And Specializes IN Assembly Integration, Program Management And Product Distribution. Its Services Include Precision Metal Fabrication, Stamping And Machining. The Company Operates A More Than 90,000-Square-Foot Warehouse Space. Accu-Fab Offers A Range Of Equipment, Such As Sawing, Laser Cutting, Hardware, Welding, Material Handling, Quality Inspection And Electronic Data Transfer. It Constructs Multicomponent Fabricated Assemblies By Using Feed Riveting Machines And Resistance Welding Techniques. The Company Manufactures Heat Sinks, Jigs And Fixtures That Help IN Assembly And Ensuring Adherence To Tolerance Requirements. Accu-Fab Also Offers Powder, Wet Paint, Plating And Electrocoat Finishing Services. It Is Located IN Raleigh, N.C.

label: abco-automation-inc
description: Abco Automation Is On A Mission To Provide Customers With A Single Source For Engineering Solutions, Automation Services And Manufacturing Support. Abco Automation Has More Than 12 Years Experience IN Developing And Implementing Machine Vision And Robotic Systems, Such As Vision-Guided Robots, Small Parts Assembly, Automated Test Systems And Laser Cutting And Marking Systems. The Engineering Department Offers Feasibility Studies And Assistance IN Procuring And Installing Packaging Equipment. Some Applications That Its Controls And Systems Integration Department Can Assist With Are Control Upgrades, Process Control, New Lines, Custom Machine Controls, Production Monitoring And Data Collection. Abco Automation S Mechanical Design And Engineering Group Creates Solutions For Material Handling, Packaging And Filling Problems. The Mechanical Manufacturing Division Specializes IN Stainless Steel Work For Pharmaceutical And Food And Beverage Applications. Its Electrical And Assembly Department Offers Control Panel Design And Build, Mechanical Systems Assembly, Calibration, Controls Wiring, Equipment Relocation And Refurbishment And Equipment Testing.

label: aallied-die-casting-co-of-nc
company: Aallied Die Casting Co Of NC
description: Based IN Rutherfordton, N.C., Aallied Die Casting Company Of North Carolina Is One Of The Divisions Of Rcm Industries. It Has Complete Engineering And Quality Systems And Capabilities That Include A Two-Station, Computer-Based, Computer-Aided Design System; Statistical Process Control System; Metal Traceability System; And Comprehensive Product Testing Capabilities. The Company Operates Advanced, Electric Dipole Moment-Equipped Toolroom Facilities To Maintain Die Casting And Trim Dies And Machining Fixtures. It Has A More Than 100,000-Square-Foot Facility That Includes Over 10 Die Cast Machines And Concentrator Machining Centers. The Company Offers A Wide Range Of Engineering And Tool Design Services, Including Computerized Gating Design, Metal Flow Analysis, Component Castability Design And Consulting, And Tool And Steel Analysis And Routines. Rcm Industries Is One Of The Largest Custom Die Casters IN North America That Serves Various Industries, Including Appliance, Automotive, Communications, Industrial Equipment, Lawn And Garden, Lighting And Recreational.

label: a-b-carter-inc
description: A.B. Carter Is A Leading Supplier Of A Wide Range Of Mill Supplies And Laboratory Equipment To The Textile Industry. A.B. Carter S Primary Textile Products Include Travelers And Rings, Tapes And Belts, Bobbins, Splicing Systems, Knotters, Stroboscopes, End Detectors And Textile Laboratory Equipment. The Company Also Serves Other Industries Through The Sale Of Precision Machine Parts, Stampings And Low-Carbon Wire. A.B. Carter Began Manufacturing And Marketing Its First Products, The Boyce Weavers Knotter, Shortly After Its Founding IN 1922. A.B. description: Colonial Carton Company Is A Designer And Manufacturer Of Custom Folding Cartons Based IN Clayton, N.C. A Privately Owned Company, Colonial Is A Member Of The Independent Carton Group. Its Departments Consist Of Customer Service, Graphics, Structural Design, Plate Making, Proofing, Die Shop, Sheeting/Inventory, Printing, Die Cutting And Finishing.
